descriptions_txt: ['Fidelity TalentSource is your destination for discovering your next temporary role at Fidelity Investments. We are currently sourcing for an External Candidate Developer to work fully remote.', 'The External Candidate Developer will be part of a sourcing team at Fidelity. The main focus of the role is to build and implement sourcing plans to identify, engage and attract talent for job functions and/or role that are in demand across the enterprise and /or within a specific business unit. The External Candidate Developer will also promote Fidelity, engage with potential candidates, and assess candidates for organization/role fit with a goal of introducing interested and qualified candidates to business unit aligned talent acquisition teams. This position will be focused mainly on licensed financial advisor recruiting efforts and will be a remote/virtual role.', 'Safety is our top priority. Once we can be together in person with fewer safety measures, this role will follow our dynamic working approach. You’ll be spending some of your time onsite depending on the nature and needs of your role.', 'Our aim is to combine the best of working offsite with coming together in person. For most teams this means a consistent balance of working from home and office that supports the needs of your role, experience level, and working style.', 'Your success and growth is important to us, so you’ll want to enjoy the benefits of coming together in person – face to face learning and training, quality time with your manager and teammates, building your career network, making friends, and taking full advantage of cultural and social experiences Fidelity provides for you.', 'Fidelity TalentSource is the in-house temporary staffing provider for Fidelity Investments, one of the largest and most diversified global financial services firms in the industry. We welcome individuals from all backgrounds, including technology and customer service, to fill assignments across Fidelity’s U.S.-based regional and investor center locations. If you would like to experience Fidelity’s supportive and collaborative culture while expanding your skill set and developing your professional network, consider a role with Fidelity TalentSource. Apply today at FTSJobs.com.', 'We believe that the most effective way to attract, develop and retain a diverse workforce is to build an enduring culture of inclusion and belonging.\nFidelity TalentSource will reasonably accommodate applicants with disabilities who need adjustments to participate in the application or interview process. To initiate a request for an accommodation, please contact our HR team at HR@ ftsjobs.com.', 'Fidelity will continue to keep the safety of associates and customers as our top priority and this will never change. As the pandemic evolves and Federal, State, and Local regulations emerge, it has become clear that knowing the vaccination status of all associates is critical to our safety efforts.', 'Therefore, Fidelity will require all candidates to disclose their COVID-19 vaccination status during the hiring process, and if vaccinated, provide proof of vaccine.', 'This is not a requirement to be vaccinated. It is a requirement to report vaccination status and, if vaccinated, provide proof.', 'At Fidelity Investments, our customers are at the heart of everything we do. As a privately held company with a rich 75-year history, our mission has remained the same since our founding: to strengthen the financial well-being of our clients. We help people invest and plan for their future. We assist companies and non-profit organizations in delivering benefits to their employees. And we provide institutions and independent advisors with investment and technology solutions to help invest their own clients’ money. For information about working at Fidelity, visit FidelityCareers.com.', 'Fidelity Investments and Fidelity TalentSource are equal opportunity employers.']
descriptions_list: ['Partner with business unit talent acquisition consultants and researcher to develop multi-faceted sourcing plans targeting potential candidates in specific job functions (i.e., data science, architecture, information security, digital and social media)', 'Use a variety of sources to identify and engage potential talent', 'Develop strategies and plans to introduce potential talent to Fidelity and ensure on-going engagement of talent pipelines', 'Collaborate with business unit and/or talent acquisition leaders on the development of sourcing plans', 'Keep informed of sourcing best practices and emerging tools/technologies; introduce and/or pilot when appropriate', 'Measure and analyze sourcing results to inform ongoing and future sourcing efforts', 'Assist in training talent acquisition teams on sourcing best practices and/or optimization of tools or technologies', 'Proven ability in a talent sourcing role, including development and implementation of targeted sourcing strategies.', 'Shown ability to think creatively about where and how to identify talent; experience assessing and developing short and long-term engagement strategies for talent pipelines', 'Subject matter expertise in the talent sourcing industry, specifically new and emerging tools, technologies and practices', 'Strong consultative skills – including the ability to present and share market insights, influence peers and business leaders and clearly articulate results and/or alternatives', 'Outstanding organizational and time management skills including the ability to work independently to complete concurrent assignments in a timely fashion', 'Resourceful, critical and strategic thinker, and creative problem solver: ability to quickly and optimally get things done while handling unanticipated issues', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills']

cons: ['"No benefits which is weird in this economy." (in 1 reviews)']

descriptions_txt:
['Job Title: Data Scientist
Reports To: Controller
FLSA Status: Exempt
Summary of Position:
The Data Scientist is responsible for supporting the business entity, including Revenue Cycle Management, Physician Operations and Executive Leadership with insights gained from analyzing company data. Writes code using various programming languages including SQL and generates reports using Power BI, Crystal Reports and other software required for reporting to internal managers and external partners as needed. Analyzes and synthesizes complex and diverse information gathered from senior management and end users to develop new reports and reporting systems as needed.', 'Job Responsibilities:
 Employee must adhere to STRG Policies and Procedures at all times
 Research and devise innovative statistical models for data analysis
 Analyze data for trends and patterns, and interpret data with clear objectives in mind
 Integrate various software data into one report and/or database
 Communicate analytical solutions to stake holders and implement improvements as needed
 Design, develop and implement complex dashboard reports and visualizations for data warehouse.
 Responsible for the development and support of strategies for data warehouse implementation, data acquisitions and archive recovery.
 Query data using Power BI and/or other ad hoc query tools to produce ad hoc reports upon request.
 Responsible for data mining and analytical capability to support decision making and corporate strategy set by the executive team
 Extract data from various agency EHRs and use technical/analytical skills to produce reporting for management.
 Document sources of reports and steps necessary to generate complex reports.
 Support departmental initiatives as requested.


Maintain strict confidentiality of patient protected health information as mandated by STRG procedures and HIPAA Privacy, Security, HITECH, and Transactions and Code Sets regulations
 Perform other duties as required
Supervisory Responsibilities:
None
Experience / Skill Requirements:', 'Education:
Bachelor’s degree in statistics, applied mathematics, data science or related discipline required. Master’s Degree preferred. Work experience in lieu of formal education may be substituted.
Attendance / Work Schedule:
Maintaining and satisfying minimum attendance requirements is an essential function of this position, including working all full-time regular hours as established for this position and scheduled or emergency overtime. Full-time regular hours are defined as Monday through Friday, with after-hours or weekends as required. All employees in this job classification are required to satisfy this requirement. This job classification does not include "light duty" work or allow unpredictable or unrestricted absences.', 'Job Type: Full-time']
descriptions_list: ['Strong attention to detail and ability to multitask multiple priorities', '7 or more years of experience in data science', 'Coding knowledge and experience with several languages (C, C++, Java)', 'Experience querying databases and using statistical computer languages: R, Python, SQL, etc.', 'Proficiency with data mining, mathematics and statistical analysis', 'JavaScript', 'Cursory understanding of healthcare terminology, including CPT, RVU and charge terminology']

descriptions_txt: ['What we do:', 'Our client is the premier Industrial AI company, providing a predictive analytics SaaS platform that empowers major industry leaders to optimize performance, reduce asset failures, and enhance safety. Our client combines their strengths — machine learning, analytics, data visualization, and software development — to deliver actionable insights that make industry more reliable, productive, safe and secure.', 'What Data Scientists Do Here:', 'Data science is at the core of what they do. They collaborate with customers, engineering, product, and other teams to contribute insights and data science best practices to all parts of the business.', 'Typical day to day tasks for a data scientist might include:', 'What We Are Looking For:', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Pay: $150,000.00 - $180,000.00 per year', 'Benefits:', 'Schedule:', 'Supplemental Pay:', 'Work Location: Remote']
descriptions_list: ['Collaborating with sales and customers to analyze problems and assess needs.', 'Data readiness assessments for customers.', 'Learning a new programming language or data science technique - we continually build our skills and explore new things.', 'Building, testing, and deploying supervised or unsupervised learning models.', 'Writing data analysis reports for internal use.', 'Building tools to enable other data scientists to scale their knowledge and increase impact.', 'Working with customers to develop analyses that help them solve business problems and drive value.', 'Building and deploying models to cloud based solutions for customers', 'Presenting exploratory and modeling results to a customer', 'Azure Deployment experience is a Must!', "Bachelor's degree or higher in a relevant field", '3-5 years experience, preferably in an analytical and client facing role', 'Passion for data science! descriptions_txt: ['As senior member of the Digital Data team, the head of data architecture will play a hands-on leadership role to lead, develop and enhance the data architecture team. He or She will be responsible for the overall data architecture coherence and state of the art data platforms. Digital Data architecture team is in charge of setting the enterprise standards, reviewing and/or implementing solutions and services transversally in collaboration with the different data verticals (Data engineering, Data Dev Ops, visual engineering, Data Domain functions). This leader will ensure internal and external solutions are consistent to the overall strategies across Sanofi, relevant roadmaps, and internal standards where appropriate.', 'The position will report directly to the Global Head of Data architecture Operations and Governance. This role will closely work with multiple transversal Digital teams (e.g. Data, Agile CoE, Consumer Experience, Architecture committees), Digital Technology (e.g. infrastructure, cloud, network, cybersecurity), and key business stakeholders. Efforts will also include developing and reviewing business cases and identifying potential technologies that could support business capabilities and their digital transformations. This resource will have direct people management responsibilities and accountability for several teams:', 'Data Architects – technical solution architects supporting the Digital Data priorities within business & analytic, Real-World evidence, R&D, industrial affairs ...', 'Portfolio and Project Planning – Work closely with the program team and be in charge of defining priorities, resources and budgets.', 'This resource will also drive continuous improvements within their scope inclusive of documentation, processes, governance, success measurement criteria, and operating models.', 'KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS:', 'Have solid experience in developing Data architecture roadmaps, blueprints, and designing real world solutions. Experience with both Waterfall and Agile methodologies.', 'Possess practical knowledge of data solutions in business processes and business decisions. Pharmaceutical and life science experience is a nice to have.', 'Demonstrate excellent skills of translating requirements into workable, fit for purpose, technical designs and solutions. Have extensive experience on technical solution identification and rationalization.', 'Previous Hands-on experience in delivering and leading Data Science and machine learning projects', 'Proven experience in all phases of a Big Data/Analytics project: Concept & design, development, implementation, change and operation', 'Advanced experience in programming (Python, SQL, bash)', 'Experience with Docker, Kubernetes/AKS/EKS/Openshift', 'Experience with DevOps, CI/CD and MLOps automation', 'Experience in cloud architecting and machine learning technologies – Azure/AWS/GCP', 'Experience in data technologies Snowflake and other data warehouses, informatica, Kafka, AWS data toolbox, Airflow, databricks, .', 'Experience in designing data and/or machine learning solution architectures', 'Strong customer focus, assertiveness, and precise method of operation', 'Ability in understanding of architectural dependencies of technologies in a vast and complex environment', 'Able to communicate and present internally and externally in a confident manner', 'Proven ability to build develop and lead teams', 'Must be able to quickly adapt to a changing and highly dynamic work environment', 'Strong relationship management skills in working with business colleagues, Digital team members, senior leadership team members, and vendors', 'Demonstrated ability to lead and/or influence decision making', 'Resolve conflicts with tact and diplomacy', 'Ability to communicate clearly and effectively. Fluent in English, both orally and in writing. Other language skills are a plus', 'Ability to work autonomously and work effectively with global teams to get the job done', 'BACKGROUND:', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related scientific or technical disciplines. Advanced degree is preferred. Additional professional certificate is a plus", '>10+ years Data, ML Ops experience is a plus.', 'Strong demonstrated experience in leadership, Implementation and Operational Support, senior stakeholder management, business partnering, and clear, effective communication skills.', 'Experience leading multidisciplinary teams with direct supervisory and people management responsibilities.', 'Sanofi Inc. and its U.S. affiliates are Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employers committed to a culturally diverse workforce. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race; color; creed; religion; national origin; age; ancestry; nationality; marital, domestic partnership or civil union status; sex, gender, gender identity or expression; affectional or sexual orientation; disability; veteran or military status or liability for military status; domestic violence victim status; atypical cellular or blood trait; genetic information (including the refusal to submit to genetic testing) or any other characteristic protected by law.', '#GD-SA', '#LI-SA', 'At Sanofi diversity and inclusion is foundational to how we operate and embedded in our Core Values. We recognize to truly tap into the richness diversity brings we must lead with inclusion and have a workplace where those differences can thrive and be leveraged to empower the lives of our colleagues, patients and customers. We respect and celebrate the diversity of our people, their backgrounds and experiences and provide equal opportunity for all.']

descriptions_txt: ['The team:', 'Your Job:', 'As a Software Engineering Manager at Indeed you will provide hands-on leadership for a development team building and enhancing products and systems in our service-oriented, highly scalable, multi-datacenter environment. As our engineering organization grows, you will help ensure we keep the talent bar high and grow the skills and capabilities of your team. All of Indeed’s products are built with performance, scalability, and data-driven decision-making in mind.', 'Requirements', 'US Remote 143,000 - 207,000 USD per year']

descriptions_txt: ['Position Overview: The primary goal of the Marketing Data Analyst is to use data science and analytics to support the Optum Tri-State MarCom function (CareMount Medical, ProHEALTH, Riverside Medical Group), ensuring a solid growth strategy behind each initiative the department delivers. They will design, produce, validate, and distribute campaign performance reports based on both agency and internal resources, as well as provide key insights from these reports. The position requires strong analytic and organizational skills, initiative, ability to work independently, and a willingness to develop robust reporting capabilities for the marketing team, in order to report out campaign ROI and KPI’s to leadership. This position will require collaboration with data owners and functions across the organization.\nEssential Duties and Responsibilities (including but not limited to the following):', 'Qualifications and Education:', 'Full COVID-19 vaccination is an essential requirement of this role. CareMount Medical/CareMount Health Solutions will adhere to all federal, state and local regulations as well as all client requirements and will obtain necessary proof of vaccination prior to employment to ensure compliance.', '#ZR', 'Job Type: Full-time']
descriptions_list: ['Provide the reports and analysis required to effectively support strategic planning and campaign success for the department.', 'Perform hands-on tasks, including data acquisition from disparate systems, data transformation and analysis, benchmarking, and communicating insights.', 'Design and construct data tables, schemas, dashboards, and visualizations related to marketing campaign performance.', 'Conduct comprehensive market analysis to identify strategically relevant targets for campaigns, considering marketing objective, campaign scale, and industry trends.', 'Perform data validation tests to ensure data completeness and accuracy.', 'Collaborate with IT, Decision Support, and external vendors to develop new solutions that inform the MarCom function and illustrate impact.', 'Consolidate campaign and vendor performance data into key insights, which will be leveraged for marketing optimization and during budgeting/contract renewal process.', "Four-year degree in quantitative discipline from an accredited institution required such as Business, Economics, Statistics, Biostatistics, Epidemiology, Healthcare Administration; Master's degree in a data-related field preferred.", 'Minimum 2 years of experience working in a marketing analytics role; health care preferred.', 'Previous experience working with large databases, e.g. data warehousing, and/or database administration preferred.', 'Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel; including pivot tables, linked spreadsheets, lookup formulas, and graphing; proficiency in Microsoft Word and PowerPoint.', 'Ability to query systems, abstract data, and clearly summarize and present actionable data.', 'Knowledge and proficiency in SQL, SAS, Tableau/Power BI; SSRS. EMR (Next Gen) experience a plus.', 'Working knowledge of medical coding preferred (CPT, HCPCS, ICD).', 'Key traits – quantitative analysis skills, critical thinking skills, strong communicator, entrepreneurial spirit, creativity, leadership, self-starter, results orientation, ability to balance multiple projects, attention to detail.']

descriptions_txt:
['Immediate need for a talented Data Scientist with experience in the Energy Industry.
This is a 06+ Months Contract opportunity with long-term potential and is located in Atlanta, GA. Please review the job description below.

Job ID: 22-06525

Key Responsibilities:', 'Key Requirements and Technology Experience:', 'Our client is a leading Energy Industry and we are currently interviewing to fill this and other similar contract positions. If you are interested in this position, please apply online for immediate consideration.']
descriptions_list: ['The AI and Data Science team is centralized across the entire organization.', 'We work with various product teams across various business units to define high-impact business problems, solve them using Client techniques, and execute and monitor them throughout their lifecycle.', 'Most of our models make it to production, they never sit in a research lab.', 'But we also do quite a bit of research to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies/algorithms.', 'We are very collaborative, you will likely get lots of ideas from the team.', 'Our locomotives stream 350+ sensor information in real-time.', 'We create predictive models to predict various component failures hours, days, and sometimes months in advance.', 'There are high-frame cameras beside our tracks, capturing images of trains and rail cars as they pass. We design various Deep Learning and Computer Vision algorithms to detect certain objects of interest or issues and defects.', 'We then optimize their performance and deploy them at the edge for real-time scoring and notification of our mechanical personnel upon detections.', 'We use Python, R, and Spark (PySpark, SparkR) for modeling and EDA.', 'You will have a local machine with 512GB of memory, so feel free to load the data in memory if it makes sense or if it fits (!)', 'You will also have terabytes of memory in our Spark cluster that is not shared by anyone.', 'We use Jupyter notebook, Emacs, PyCharm, Rstudio as IDEs.', 'We use Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, and MXNet for Deep Learning, and OpenCV for traditional Computer Vision.', 'We always have the latest versions of our tools/packages/libraries available.', 'Bachelor’s, Master’s or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Machine Learning, Statistics or related field', 'Minimum of 1 year of relevant industry experience (as a Data Scientist, Research Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, etc.), 2+ preferred; or proven qualifications.', 'Hands-on and theoretical knowledge of various Machine Learning algorithms and tools, e.g. xgboost/LightGBM, Random Forests, SVMs, PCA, t-sne, kmeans, DBSCAN, etc.', 'Expertise with Time Series problems is a plus', 'Excellent knowledge of Python and/or R', 'knowledge of Spark (PySpark and SparkR) is a plus', 'Effectively utilize appropriate statistical, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning models and techniques to solve various business problems', 'Collaborate with various departments to identify opportunities for process improvement and developing analytics use-cases.', 'Evaluate accuracy and quality of data sources, as well as the designed models', 'Stays up to date with the latest models and changes in the technology', 'Communicate results to colleagues and business partners.', 'This position will focus on Statistics and Machine Learning models (regression, classification, clustering, etc.) and it will not have a Computer Vision or Deep Learning focus.']

descriptions_txt: ['JOB DESCRIPTION', 'A top streaming client is looking for a Senior Product Manager, Data to join their Product Management team. This role will serve as the sole product owner and evangelist for their data products implementation. This is to help achieve normalization of their outputted data as they collect data from many different sources. On a day-to-day level, this candidate will work cross functionally with engineering and 3rd party teams to properly ingest data, own it, operate it, then output. This role will require expertise in the ability to vision plan and guide where data products should go, how they should be used and to properly scale. As the sole Product Manager in the data domain, this candidate must have a strong background in true data product management. A technical mindset and background is highly preferred in this role as this candidate will be responsible for deciphering challenges within the data, how to event track relevant data, build data confidence and communicate strategies to all necessary teams. This is an exciting opportunity to join a booming client in the streaming industry while completely taking ownership of new and innovative mobile applications!', 'MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS', 'DESIRED SKILLS']
descriptions_list: ['Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field', '5+ years of data product management experience (BI tools, data lakes, event tracking, ingestion)', 'Strong knowledge and experience of owning the implementation of data architecture (AWS environment)', 'Experience owning the integration of data products and event tracking tools (M-particle)', 'Technical-level understanding of data planning and infrastructure in order to provide vision for data products', 'Experience with A/B testing tools and methodologies', 'Experience creating basic wireframes', 'Engineering background', 'Experience or knowledge of data science']

descriptions_txt: ['The Company', 'Hopps (www.hopps.io) is an LA-based startup that provides one-click access to instant help with some of the most popular digital and SaaS tools. Our platform connects clients with vetted experts in less than five minutes via video and screenshare to solve roadblocks in real-time. Whether you need help with setup, optimization, or strategy, Hopps can help you get it right in a fraction of the time.', 'The Role', 'The Data Science / Analyst Expert role is a remote, freelancer position on the Hopps platform. As an expert you’ll be connected to clients via Hopps’ web based audio-video technology to help provide real time answers and insight. Experience working with multiple clients as data consulting firms and certifications/ credentials in relevant data tools is preferred, but not required. Experts choose when to work on the platform and which client session to join based on availability, specific client question etc. Experts will be paid based on billable time for each session they run on Hopps.', 'Responsibilities', 'Tools and Platforms', 'We are looking for experts who are hands-on with at least one or more of these tools:', 'Job Types: Full-time, Part-time', 'Pay: $95.00 per hour', 'Benefits:', 'Schedule:', 'Application Question(s):', 'Education:', 'Experience:', 'Work Location: Remote']
descriptions_list: ['When a client submits a request for help you will be notified via email and text.', 'Based on your availability and the nature of the request, you can choose to either accept or decline the session.', 'During each session you will: Help understand more about the client’s issue and the solutions they are looking for. Collaborate with the client in real time to solve their issues and get them set up for success.', 'Unlike agencies, our experts work with the client to teach them how to solve these problems on their own and enable them to succeed independently.', 'Summarize your insights, tips and advice and provide clients’ with clear next steps.', 'Segment, MixPanel, Supermtrics, Google Data Studio, Looker, Tableau, Power BI', 'Paid time off', 'On call', 'Do you have any experience in Segment, MixPanel, Google Data Studio? descriptions_list: ['Work with a team of data scientists to develop robust statistical modeling approaches and drive data driven solutions to business questions.', 'Drive your own data science projects including design, data collection, development, execution, and communication.', 'Simultaneously work on large projects that solve problems in novel ways and small ad-hoc projects that require nimble fast results.', 'Navigate many multi-functional stakeholders and communicate technical results effectively to non-technical audiences.', 'Develop as a data scientist who excels both technically, but also as a business leader through direct mentorship and close integration with business teams.', 'Bachelor’s degree and 3+ years of experience analyzing data in a professional setting.', 'End to end experience with data science projects from ideation and hypothesis development to visualization and communication.', 'A fundamental understanding of statistical concepts and an understanding of when to apply different machine learning approaches.', 'Proficiency with one or more statistical analysis and scripting tools including R, Python, etc.', 'Experience with data extraction and manipulation from relational and non-relational databases.', 'Curiosity and drive to learn new skills, and challenge others to do the same.', 'Possess strong problem-solving skills and an interest in applying them to business and financial questions.']

descriptions_list: ['Medical', 'Dental', '401K', 'PTO Options', 'Research, design, develop and implement statistical models, AI and advanced machine learning applications to support Clinical Effectiveness Team projects, Pediatric Clinical Care, Research and Informatics leaders. Will work with current data and others with analytical skills to support this endeavor.', 'Develop the documentation and process to identify metrics, targets, weights and resulting clinical integration performance reports for clinical providers.', 'Support the technical team focused on creative use of diverse data sources, such as electronic health record data, insurance claims data, scheduling and financial data, social determinants of health data, and any other relevant sources that help support Clinical Effectiveness, Pediatric Clinical Care, Research, and Health Analytics and Informatics leaders’ strategies.', 'Work with the analytics team to develop new analytic methods and reporting systems to include visual dashboards and other direct-to-provider or direct-to-staff information.', 'Support the analytics team in the creation of analytics and scientific exploration related to value- based care strategies for defining Return on Investment and other financial performance for Clinical Effectiveness, Pediatric Clinical Care and other initiatives across the system of care.', 'In collaboration with information technology, support the architecture of clinical integration approach for disparate data systems including use of data warehouse, external vendor supplied information and any future systems that are needed.', 'Develop analytic models that can be used to identify at-risk patients, predict outcomes, and measure illness severity in critically ill children, and develop methods to share these models with clinicians.', 'Mentor and support the training of new and existing staff in data science and advanced analytics, especially trainees.', 'Maintain fluency in existing and emerging data science technologies and complete online coursework or independent study to fill in gaps of knowledge as needed to manage and execute innovation projects.', 'Contribute to the design and development of databases that help support Clinical Effectiveness, Pediatric Clinical Care, Research, and Informatics Teams’ leader strategies.', 'Oversee the development of novel data pipelines that integrate and normalize large data from a variety of sources (e.g., Informatics strategies.', 'Collect and maintain Quality Improvement collaborative data for multiple projects across the Rainbow system of care.', 'Master’s degree in math, statistics, computer science, economics, sociology, public health, or related quantitative or social science discipline required; PhD level work in analytics, statistics or related field preferred', 'Preferred experience or working knowledge with complex analytic situations or big data environments. Completion of a Masters or Doctoral degree will fulfill this experience requirement.', 'Preferred experience or working knowledge of with statistics, machine / deep learning (AI) in a healthcare setting. A Masters or Doctoral degree can fulfill this experience requirement.', 'Experience or working knowledge of complex analytic situations or big data environments', 'Experience or working knowledge with statistcis, machine learning/ AI in a healthcare setting', 'This position requires a self-starter who is adept at independent decision-making and is ideally suited for emerging leaders in health data sciences.', 'Extensive experience working with SQL or statistical programming languages (e.g., R, Python) and other data science tools (e.g., Alteryx) to analyze and visualize health care data.', 'Ability to develop data pipelines to support AI and machine learning model development.', 'Ability to learn new software and emerging technologies without extensive hands-on training.', 'Experience in visualization and reporting programs such as Power BI, Tableau, Microstrategy, etc.', 'Expertise is desired working with electronic health record and claims data and fluency working with standardized vocabularies, such as ICD, CPT, LOINC, RxNorm.']

job_title: Senior Director, Member Modeling Data Science
descriptions_txt: ['Become a Part of the NIKE, Inc. Team', 'NIKE, Inc. does more than outfit the world’s best athletes. It is a place to explore potential, obliterate boundaries and push out the edges of what can be. The company looks for people who can grow, think, dream and create. Its culture thrives by embracing diversity and rewarding imagination. The brand seeks achievers, leaders and visionaries. At NIKE, Inc. it’s about each person bringing skills and passion to a challenging and constantly evolving game.', 'Member Modeling Data Science is part of Nike’s Insights function. So you will also be a member of the broader data science and analytics community at Nike, and participate in our data science labs, study groups, and activities, and attend conferences.', 'What you bring', 'NIKE, Inc. is a growth company that looks for team members to grow with it. Nike offers a generous total rewards package, casual work environment, a diverse and inclusive culture, and an electric atmosphere for professional development. No matter the location, or the role, every Nike employee shares one galvanizing mission: To bring inspiration and innovation to every athlete* in the world.', 'NIKE, Inc. is committed to employing a diverse workforce. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability.']
descriptions_list: ['Lead a talented team of Data Science Directors and Sr Data Scientists. Hire, onboard, and develop additional data scientists and data science directors.', 'Lead workstreams that require cross-functional squads that include data scientists, data engineers, analysts, and product managers.', 'Manage our portfolio of member model capabilities, including lifetime value, segmentation, fraud, and onboarding models.', 'Develop methods and tools that further enrich Nike’s member data while also respecting the privacy of our members.', 'Expand the vision for member modeling at Nike. Learn the business of designing shoes and apparel and bringing them to market around the globe to understand how to best serve stakeholders.', 'Be a part of the broader data science community within Nike and contribute to a culture of learning.', 'Experience hiring and mentoring exceptional data scientists.', 'Experience leading through leaders (directors will report into you).', 'Experience developing strong partnerships with engineering and product teams.', 'Experience communicating technical roadmaps to business leaders.', 'Experience practicing data science.', 'A product and entrepreneurial mindset.', 'Bachelors degree or higher or Combination of relevant education, experience and training.']

descriptions_txt: ['As senior member of the Digital Data team, the head of data architecture will play a hands-on leadership role to lead, develop and enhance the data architecture team. He or She will be responsible for the overall data architecture coherence and state of the art data platforms. Digital Data architecture team is in charge of setting the enterprise standards, reviewing and/or implementing solutions and services transversally in collaboration with the different data verticals (Data engineering, Data Dev Ops, visual engineering, Data Domain functions). This leader will ensure internal and external solutions are consistent to the overall strategies across Sanofi, relevant roadmaps, and internal standards where appropriate.', 'The position will report directly to the Global Head of Data architecture Operations and Governance. This role will closely work with multiple transversal Digital teams (e.g. Data, Agile CoE, Consumer Experience, Architecture committees), Digital Technology (e.g. infrastructure, cloud, network, cybersecurity), and key business stakeholders. Efforts will also include developing and reviewing business cases and identifying potential technologies that could support business capabilities and their digital transformations. This resource will have direct people management responsibilities and accountability for several teams:', 'Data Architects – technical solution architects supporting the Digital Data priorities within business & analytic, Real-World evidence, R&D, industrial affairs ...', 'Portfolio and Project Planning – Work closely with the program team and be in charge of defining priorities, resources and budgets.', 'This resource will also drive continuous improvements within their scope inclusive of documentation, processes, governance, success measurement criteria, and operating models.', 'KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS:', 'Have solid experience in developing Data architecture roadmaps, blueprints, and designing real world solutions. Experience with both Waterfall and Agile methodologies.', 'Possess practical knowledge of data solutions in business processes and business decisions. Pharmaceutical and life science experience is a nice to have.', 'Demonstrate excellent skills of translating requirements into workable, fit for purpose, technical designs and solutions. Have extensive experience on technical solution identification and rationalization.', 'Previous Hands-on experience in delivering and leading Data Science and machine learning projects', 'Proven experience in all phases of a Big Data/Analytics project: Concept & design, development, implementation, change and operation', 'Advanced experience in programming (Python, SQL, bash)', 'Experience with Docker, Kubernetes/AKS/EKS/Openshift', 'Experience with DevOps, CI/CD and MLOps automation', 'Experience in cloud architecting and machine learning technologies – Azure/AWS/GCP', 'Experience in data technologies Snowflake and other data warehouses, informatica, Kafka, AWS data toolbox, Airflow, databricks, .', 'Experience in designing data and/or machine learning solution architectures', 'Strong customer focus, assertiveness, and precise method of operation', 'Ability in understanding of architectural dependencies of technologies in a vast and complex environment', 'Able to communicate and present internally and externally in a confident manner', 'Proven ability to build develop and lead teams', 'Must be able to quickly adapt to a changing and highly dynamic work environment', 'Strong relationship management skills in working with business colleagues, Digital team members, senior leadership team members, and vendors', 'Demonstrated ability to lead and/or influence decision making', 'Resolve conflicts with tact and diplomacy', 'Ability to communicate clearly and effectively. Fluent in English, both orally and in writing. Other language skills are a plus', 'Ability to work autonomously and work effectively with global teams to get the job done', 'BACKGROUND:', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related scientific or technical disciplines. descriptions_txt: ['In accordance with guidelines regarding companies classified as Federal contractors and consistent with our core commitment of safety, National Grid has made the decision to require all new hires to be fully COVID-19 vaccinated as a condition of hire. "Full vaccination" is defined as two weeks after both doses of a two-dose vaccine or two weeks since a single-dose vaccine has been administered. Anyone unable to be vaccinated, either because of a religious belief or a disability can request a reasonable accommodation.', 'Every day we deliver safe and secure energy to homes, communities, and businesses. We are there when people need us the most. We connect people to the energy they need for the lives they live. The pace of change in society and our industry is accelerating and our expertise and track record puts us in an unparalleled position to shape the sustainable future of our industry.', 'To be successful we must anticipate the needs of our customers, reducing the cost of energy delivery today and pioneering the flexible energy systems of tomorrow. This requires us to deliver on our promises and always look for new opportunities to grow, both ourselves and our business.', 'National Grid is hiring a Lead Data Scientist for our Economics & Load Forecasting Department in Hicksville, NY or Waltham, MA.', 'The Economics & Gas Forecasting team produces the gas load forecasts for National Grid as well economic analysis and insight. As a Lead Data Scientist you will develop, present, and defend the gas and load forecasts for our US service territory using econometric methods. Conduct advanced quantitative analyses and develop sophisticated statistical and machine learning models and optimization tools to help the company achieve its regulatory, financial, operational and growth goals. You will understand policy requirement and help ensure project development be aligned with regulatory perspective. You will support internal stakeholders including Supply, Engineering, Regulatory, Strategy, Finance and others. You will assist in the presentation and defense of the forecasts to regulatory bodies in MA, RI, and NY. You will ensure the forecasts incorporate new distributed energy resources, technologies, and policies.', 'In accordance with guidelines regarding companies classified as Federal contractors and consistent with our core commitment of safety, National Grid has made the decision to require all new hires to be fully COVID-19 vaccinated as a condition of hire. "Full vaccination" is defined as two weeks after both doses of a two-dose vaccine or two weeks since a single-dose vaccine has been administered. Anyone unable to be vaccinated, either because of a religious belief or a disability can request a reasonable accommodation.', 'This position has a career path which provides for advancement opportunities within and across bands as you develop and evolve in the position; gaining experience, expertise and acquiring and applying technical skills. Internal candidates will be assessed and provided offers against the minimum qualifications of this role and their individual experience.', 'National Grid is an equal opportunity employer that values a broad diversity of talent, knowledge, experience and expertise. We foster a culture of inclusion that drives employee engagement to deliver superior performance to the communities we serve. National Grid is proud to be an affirmative action employer. We encourage minorities, women, individuals with disabilities and protected veterans to join the National Grid team.']
descriptions_list:
['Development of gas and electric load forecast using econometric methods. Perform additional analysis relating to the forecast as necessary.', 'Ensure the forecasts properly account for distributed energy resources and new technologies and policies (e.g. energy efficiency, demand response, electrification of heat, etc.).', 'Develop advanced machine learning and statistical methods and sophisticated analytics programs for addressing and solving a wide range of problems across the business.', 'Develop advanced quantitative analyses and optimization approaches to support senior management in solution and strategy design, customer engagement, marketing campaigns, asset optimization, and energy portfolio analysis and optimization such as hedging plans.', 'Develop, maintain and enhance gas load and customer growth forecasting by using appropriate modeling technologies and training the relevant teams on model usage and results interpretation.', 'Translate functional policy into processes and procedures that drive greater efficiencies for National Grid and ensure compliance with regulations.', 'Help interpret modeling and analysis results from regulatory and/or policy perspectives.
Update forecast processes and documentation to ensure they are efficient, reviewable, and reliable.
Provide expert testimony before regulators and defend the gas/electric forecasts. Respond to data request from regulatory bodies for rate cases and other proceedings.
Collaborate with internal stakeholders (including supply, engineering, regulator, strategy) regarding forecast methodology and analysis and ensure our deliverables meet their needs.
Stay current in all policies, regulatory requirements, market trends, and industry standards regarding customer energy use and technologies and programs impacting that use, such as energy efficiency and demand response.', 'Update forecast processes and documentation to ensure they are efficient, reviewable, and reliable.', 'Provide expert testimony before regulators and defend the gas/electric forecasts. Respond to data request from regulatory bodies for rate cases and other proceedings.', 'Collaborate with internal stakeholders (including supply, engineering, regulator, strategy) regarding forecast methodology and analysis and ensure our deliverables meet their needs.', 'Stay current in all policies, regulatory requirements, market trends, and industry standards regarding customer energy use and technologies and programs impacting that use, such as energy efficiency and demand response.', 'Works well in a team.', 'Bachelor’s (Master’s or PhD preferred) in statistics, engineering, (applied) mathematics, computer science, economics, applied management science, operations research or related field. Industrial experience is a plus.', 'Strong hands-on experience and deep understanding of advanced quantitative analysis, machine learning, time series analysis, process modeling, and optimization. Experience in energy load forecasting preferred.', 'Proficient in statistical programming languages such as to Python, R, Matlab, SAS required. Experience in relational databases, stored procedures, SQL, and Non-SQL database systems preferred.', 'Experience in cloud computation preferred', 'Experience in project management to meet agile project development preferred', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills including the ability to testify before regulators and respond to regulatory data requests. Ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.', 'Experience with policy or forecasting distributed resources (e.g. energy efficiency, demand response, electric vehicles, PV, storage, electrification of heat, etc.) preferred.', 'Advanced Excel skills required.', 'Power BI/Tableau skills preferred.', 'Relevant energy industry experience in a regulated setting preferred.', 'Highly motivated with the ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.']

job_title: Senior Director, Member Modeling Data Science
descriptions_txt: ['Become a Part of the NIKE, Inc. Team', 'NIKE, Inc. does more than outfit the world’s best athletes. It is a place to explore potential, obliterate boundaries and push out the edges of what can be. The company looks for people who can grow, think, dream and create. Its culture thrives by embracing diversity and rewarding imagination. The brand seeks achievers, leaders and visionaries. At NIKE, Inc. it’s about each person bringing skills and passion to a challenging and constantly evolving game.', 'Member Modeling Data Science is part of Nike’s Insights function. So you will also be a member of the broader data science and analytics community at Nike, and participate in our data science labs, study groups, and activities, and attend conferences.', 'What you bring', 'NIKE, Inc. is a growth company that looks for team members to grow with it. Nike offers a generous total rewards package, casual work environment, a diverse and inclusive culture, and an electric atmosphere for professional development. No matter the location, or the role, every Nike employee shares one galvanizing mission: To bring inspiration and innovation to every athlete* in the world.', 'NIKE, Inc. is committed to employing a diverse workforce. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability.']
descriptions_list: ['Lead a talented team of Data Science Directors and Sr Data Scientists. Hire, onboard, and develop additional data scientists and data science directors.', 'Lead workstreams that require cross-functional squads that include data scientists, data engineers, analysts, and product managers.', 'Manage our portfolio of member model capabilities, including lifetime value, segmentation, fraud, and onboarding models.', 'Develop methods and tools that further enrich Nike’s member data while also respecting the privacy of our members.', 'Expand the vision for member modeling at Nike. Learn the business of designing shoes and apparel and bringing them to market around the globe to understand how to best serve stakeholders.', 'Be a part of the broader data science community within Nike and contribute to a culture of learning.', 'Experience hiring and mentoring exceptional data scientists.', 'Experience leading through leaders (directors will report into you).', 'Experience developing strong partnerships with engineering and product teams.', 'Experience communicating technical roadmaps to business leaders.', 'Experience practicing data science.', 'A product and entrepreneurial mindset.', 'Bachelors degree or higher or Combination of relevant education, experience and training.']

descriptions_txt: ['In accordance with guidelines regarding companies classified as Federal contractors and consistent with our core commitment of safety, National Grid has made the decision to require all new hires to be fully COVID-19 vaccinated as a condition of hire. "Full vaccination" is defined as two weeks after both doses of a two-dose vaccine or two weeks since a single-dose vaccine has been administered. Anyone unable to be vaccinated, either because of a religious belief or a disability can request a reasonable accommodation.', 'Every day we deliver safe and secure energy to homes, communities, and businesses. We are there when people need us the most. We connect people to the energy they need for the lives they live. The pace of change in society and our industry is accelerating and our expertise and track record puts us in an unparalleled position to shape the sustainable future of our industry.', 'To be successful we must anticipate the needs of our customers, reducing the cost of energy delivery today and pioneering the flexible energy systems of tomorrow. This requires us to deliver on our promises and always look for new opportunities to grow, both ourselves and our business.', 'National Grid is hiring a Lead Data Scientist for our Economics & Load Forecasting Department in Hicksville, NY or Waltham, MA.', 'The Economics & Gas Forecasting team produces the gas load forecasts for National Grid as well economic analysis and insight. As a Lead Data Scientist you will develop, present, and defend the gas and load forecasts for our US service territory using econometric methods. Conduct advanced quantitative analyses and develop sophisticated statistical and machine learning models and optimization tools to help the company achieve its regulatory, financial, operational and growth goals. You will understand policy requirement and help ensure project development be aligned with regulatory perspective. You will support internal stakeholders including Supply, Engineering, Regulatory, Strategy, Finance and others. You will assist in the presentation and defense of the forecasts to regulatory bodies in MA, RI, and NY. You will ensure the forecasts incorporate new distributed energy resources, technologies, and policies.', 'In accordance with guidelines regarding companies classified as Federal contractors and consistent with our core commitment of safety, National Grid has made the decision to require all new hires to be fully COVID-19 vaccinated as a condition of hire. "Full vaccination" is defined as two weeks after both doses of a two-dose vaccine or two weeks since a single-dose vaccine has been administered. Anyone unable to be vaccinated, either because of a religious belief or a disability can request a reasonable accommodation.', 'This position has a career path which provides for advancement opportunities within and across bands as you develop and evolve in the position; gaining experience, expertise and acquiring and applying technical skills. Internal candidates will be assessed and provided offers against the minimum qualifications of this role and their individual experience.', 'National Grid is an equal opportunity employer that values a broad diversity of talent, knowledge, experience and expertise. We foster a culture of inclusion that drives employee engagement to deliver superior performance to the communities we serve. National Grid is proud to be an affirmative action employer. We encourage minorities, women, individuals with disabilities and protected veterans to join the National Grid team.']
descriptions_list:
['Development of gas and electric load forecast using econometric methods. Perform additional analysis relating to the forecast as necessary.', 'Ensure the forecasts properly account for distributed energy resources and new technologies and policies (e.g. energy efficiency, demand response, electrification of heat, etc.).', 'Develop advanced machine learning and statistical methods and sophisticated analytics programs for addressing and solving a wide range of problems across the business.', 'Develop advanced quantitative analyses and optimization approaches to support senior management in solution and strategy design, customer engagement, marketing campaigns, asset optimization, and energy portfolio analysis and optimization such as hedging plans.', 'Develop, maintain and enhance gas load and customer growth forecasting by using appropriate modeling technologies and training the relevant teams on model usage and results interpretation.', 'Translate functional policy into processes and procedures that drive greater efficiencies for National Grid and ensure compliance with regulations.', 'Help interpret modeling and analysis results from regulatory and/or policy perspectives.
Update forecast processes and documentation to ensure they are efficient, reviewable, and reliable.
Provide expert testimony before regulators and defend the gas/electric forecasts. Respond to data request from regulatory bodies for rate cases and other proceedings.
Collaborate with internal stakeholders (including supply, engineering, regulator, strategy) regarding forecast methodology and analysis and ensure our deliverables meet their needs.
Stay current in all policies, regulatory requirements, market trends, and industry standards regarding customer energy use and technologies and programs impacting that use, such as energy efficiency and demand response.', 'Update forecast processes and documentation to ensure they are efficient, reviewable, and reliable.', 'Provide expert testimony before regulators and defend the gas/electric forecasts. Respond to data request from regulatory bodies for rate cases and other proceedings.', 'Collaborate with internal stakeholders (including supply, engineering, regulator, strategy) regarding forecast methodology and analysis and ensure our deliverables meet their needs.', 'Stay current in all policies, regulatory requirements, market trends, and industry standards regarding customer energy use and technologies and programs impacting that use, such as energy efficiency and demand response.', 'Works well in a team.', 'Bachelor’s (Master’s or PhD preferred) in statistics, engineering, (applied) mathematics, computer science, economics, applied management science, operations research or related field. Industrial experience is a plus.', 'Strong hands-on experience and deep understanding of advanced quantitative analysis, machine learning, time series analysis, process modeling, and optimization. Experience in energy load forecasting preferred.', 'Proficient in statistical programming languages such as to Python, R, Matlab, SAS required. Experience in relational databases, stored procedures, SQL, and Non-SQL database systems preferred.', 'Experience in cloud computation preferred', 'Experience in project management to meet agile project development preferred', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills including the ability to testify before regulators and respond to regulatory data requests. Ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.', 'Experience with policy or forecasting distributed resources (e.g. energy efficiency, demand response, electric vehicles, PV, storage, electrification of heat, etc.) preferred.', 'Advanced Excel skills required.', 'Power BI/Tableau skills preferred.', 'Relevant energy industry experience in a regulated setting preferred.', 'Highly motivated with the ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.']

descriptions_txt:
['The Data Science (DS) Program in the College of Science and Engineering at the University of Houston–Clear Lake (UHCL) invites applications for a tenure-track faculty position at the Assistant Professor level. The starting date is anticipated to be August 2022. The newly launched Master of Science degree in Data Science at UHCL is a dynamic and multi-disciplinary program in Houston, a diverse metropolitan area with broad data science needs and opportunities.
Duties:', 'Qualifications
*
Required: *', 'Desired:
Background and interests in Big Data.
Teaching experience.', 'Required Attachments by Candidate: Curriculum Vitae, Cover Letter/Letter of Application', 'Notes to Applicant: Applications will be accepted online through our Job Opportunities page. To apply, please complete the online faculty application and attach a letter of interest and your current curriculum vitae. Reference letters will only be required of candidates invited for an on-campus interview. A background check and the successful pass of a criminal history record check is required prior to on-campus interviews. Official transcripts will be required for the finalists who are invited for on-campus interviews. Proof of eligibility to work in the U.S. must be provided as condition of employment. The position will be open until filled and review of applications begins February 1, 2022. UHCL reserves the right to extend the search or not fill the position.
University of Houston-Clear Lake is proud to be recognized by the U.S. Department of the Interior as a member of the Minority Serving Institutions Program and is an HSI: Hispanic Serving Institution as well as an Affirmative Action/Equal Opportunity Employer supporting workplace diversity.', 'Job Type: Part-time']

All areas of emphasis will be considered.', 'Strong committment to undergraduate and graduate teaching.']

descriptions_txt: ['Please review the details for the position before applying for the opening. If you are an internal employee, please apply through the internal portal on Workday. You should have your completed resume/cv and cover letter ready to upload. You should upload both documents on the third page (the required section is named resume/cv – this is also where you should upload your cover letter). These documents should either be in a PDF format (.pdf) or a Word document (.doc) format.', 'Job Posting Title', 'Job Description Summary', 'Job Description', 'Description of Duties:', 'Work with a team of research assistants to identify and collect existing data of text threads from far-right wing online forums like Stormfront, Reddit, 4Chan, and 8Chan; transcripts from Bill O’Reilly, Tucker Carlson, and Glenn Beck; and Donald Trump’s Tweets and transcripts of his speeches. Work would also include building a pipeline to scrape and parse data from online forums and conduct text analysis.', 'Skills Needed:', 'Web-scraping; quantitative text analysis experience with NLP; basic statistical skills; proficiency in Python, R, or equivalent software.', 'Other:', 'This is a casual wage position, working no more than 10 hours a week. Assignment length is for 5 months. Potential to hire two individuals . Not benefits eligible', 'Wellesley College is currently piloting a flexwork plan for administrative staff that incorporates both flexible hours and hybrid teleworking components, though all employees must live in New England.', 'All employees hired after August 2, 2021 are required to upload proof of vaccination against COVID-19, subject to approved medical or religious exemptions or disability accommodations.', 'Worker Sub-Type', 'Time Type', 'EEO Statement', 'At Wellesley, we embrace and honor difference and diversity. We believe the best ideas—the best solutions—draw on a range of voices, perspectives, and experiences. As a college, and as a community, we are dedicated to assuring that all members for the Wellesley community have an equal opportunity to flourish.', 'Wellesley College is an Equal Opportunity Employer, and we are committed to increasing the diversity of the college community and the curriculum. Wellesley College and all its subcontractors shall abide by the requirements of 41 CFR 60–1.4(a), 60–300.5(a) and 60–741.5(a). These regulations prohibit discrimination against qualified individuals based on their status as protected veterans or individuals with disabilities, and prohibit discrimination against all individuals based on their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or national origin. Moreover, these regulations require that Wellesley College and all of its subcontractors take affirmative action to employ and advance in employment individuals without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability or veteran status. Candidates who believe they can contribute to that goal are encouraged to apply.']

job_title: Data Scientist -Azure and EPIC experience preferred
descriptions_txt: ['Job Summary:', 'The role will perform research and development of advanced analytics solutions in healthcare. Interact with subject matter experts to uncover important insights and build on concepts in statistics, optimization, and machine learning to improve patient and provider experiences. Identify strategic issues, forms hypothesis, design and conduct analyses, synthesize conclusions into recommendations and presentation materials and conducts follow-up studies.', 'Position Responsibilities:', 'Use mathematics, statistics, predictive models, business analysis, and cloud technology to transform high volumes of complex data into advanced analytic solutions.', 'Understand and document business/clinical needs as well as recommend appropriate IS solutions to deliver the needed data.', 'Serve as primary data liaison to the business/clinical areas to ensure overall expectations are met or exceeded for all data/reporting needs. Facilitate effective customer engagement through regular applicable governance meetings, rounding, and communications regarding requirements, enhancements and priorities.', 'Keep abreast of current healthcare trends by attending appropriate meetings and reviewing current literature. Provides market intelligence on a regular basis to operations/product line managers and executives.', 'Research on how to collect or find raw data that can be transformed into meaningful information.', 'Position Qualifications Required:', 'Required Experience:', '2+ years’ experience applying modern machine learning algorithms (clustering, classification, and regression), statistical methods, and optimization.', 'Strong skills in SQL, fluency in coding in R and/or Python.', 'Experience using major cloud platforms such as AWS and/or Azure.', 'Strong data visualization abilities in Tableau/Qlikview, ggplot etc.', 'Familiarity with EPIC is preferred.', 'Required Education:', 'Master’s Degree in Data science, analytics, mathematics, business, or related field.', 'Training / Certification / Licensure:', 'Advanced level experience with SQL, NOSQL, Tableau, Azure, R and/or Python and other database tools for research and analysis.']
pros: ['"good benefits great co" (in 3 reviews)', '"Get yearly bonuses." (in 3 reviews)']
cons: ['"Management is not great." (in 1 reviews)']

descriptions_txt: ['In accordance with guidelines regarding companies classified as Federal contractors and consistent with our core commitment of safety, National Grid has made the decision to require all new hires to be fully COVID-19 vaccinated as a condition of hire. "Full vaccination" is defined as two weeks after both doses of a two-dose vaccine or two weeks since a single-dose vaccine has been administered. Anyone unable to be vaccinated, either because of a religious belief or a disability can request a reasonable accommodation.', 'Every day we deliver safe and secure energy to homes, communities, and businesses. We are there when people need us the most. We connect people to the energy they need for the lives they live. The pace of change in society and our industry is accelerating and our expertise and track record puts us in an unparalleled position to shape the sustainable future of our industry.', 'To be successful we must anticipate the needs of our customers, reducing the cost of energy delivery today and pioneering the flexible energy systems of tomorrow. This requires us to deliver on our promises and always look for new opportunities to grow both ourselves and our business.', 'National Grid is hiring a Lead Data Scientist for our Data Science department in Waltham, MA', 'National Grid seeks a Lead Data Scientist who is passionate about the role advanced analytics can play in providing their community with heat and power - safely, affordably, and cleanly. At National Grid, you will collaborate with a team of data scientists, data engineers, and MLOps specialists to solve problems across all parts of the business (gas, electric, and customer). You will work in a dynamic organization to turn data into actionable intelligence. The variety and complexity of challenges you will solve is second to none, but most important is the real world impact your work will have on the lives of millions of people.', 'As a member of the National Grid Data Science team, you will work cross-functionally mining big and small data and applying a variety of analytics techniques (from simple to advanced) to solve business challenges. Example projects the team has worked on include storm-caused electric outage predictions, ML-based gas leak detection, and EV charger installation forecasting. Success in this role requires a strong foundation in:', 'This position has a career path which provides for promotional opportunities within and across bands as you develop and evolve in the position; gaining experience, expertise and acquiring and applying technical skills. Internal candidates will be assessed and provided offers against the minimum qualifications of this role and their individual experience.', 'National Grid is an equal opportunity employer that values a broad diversity of talent, knowledge, experience and expertise. We foster a culture of inclusion that drives employee engagement to deliver superior performance to the communities we serve. National Grid is proud to be an affirmative action employer. We encourage minorities, women, individuals with disabilities and protected veterans to join the National Grid team.']

descriptions_txt: ['About us', 'Happy Health AI has an immediate opening for an experienced biomedical engineer to work on novel methods in biosensing from both commodity and next generation sensing modalities. We have large datasets collected from thousands of human trials and we aren’t stopping. You will assist our current data science team to tame this data and uncover its secrets, while defining next generation product specs.', 'We are looking for a biomedical engineer that is *results-driven* (and not method-driven). The ideal candidate has an eye for finding the *simplest* solution to a problem based on online (real time) and offline data collected from sensors on the human body. This candidate has a strong will to help integrate, and ideally also develop, machine learning models for signal processing.', 'We are very close to launching our first hardware product combined with our unique suite of algorithms. In this fast-paced environment, you will be joining a team of experts in signal processing and machine learning. You will be expected to be a driven, passionate, and detail-oriented team player, willing to think outside the box and help cultivate an environment of continual improvement. We are looking for team members who can give concise presentations detailing what they’ve done to the data, what assumptions they’ve made, how they evaluated the performance, and why the chosen methods worked or didn’t work.', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Preferred Skills', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Pay: $130,000.00 - $200,000.00 per year', 'Benefits:', 'Schedule:', 'Education:', 'Work Location: Remote']

development of automatic QA/QC methods and outlier methodologies', 'Knowledge of hardware, including specs and limitations', '5+ years programming experience in Python', 'Impeccable coding style and that arise from using sensors on freely moving subjects', 'Experience in Photoplethysmography, Near Infrared Spectroscopy and Imaging and/or other non-invasive optical techniques', 'Experience using descriptions_txt: ['All applications should be submitted via Interfolio (and not through Indeed) at http://apply.interfolio.com/100664', 'Job Description', 'The Master of Public Health Program (MPH) invites applications for a full-time 12-month position in the Department of Public Health and Community Medicine, Tufts University School of Medicine beginning as early as July 1, 2022. We are interested in candidates who have applied biostatistical and data science methods in public health, community, government, or consulting settings and would like to teach exclusively online.', 'Our MPH program has expanded from an in-person to an online format, and with the influx of students from various academic and professional backgrounds, we are searching for candidates from diverse cultures and academic interests to teach courses related to biostatistics and data science.', 'This is a non-tenure clinical track appointment in the Department of Public Health and Community Medicine, with initial appointment term for two years and the possibility of renewal contingent on annual performance review results. Clinical track faculty are expected to focus solely on teaching. Although encouraged, there is no expectation of scholarship or service beyond activities directly related to teaching and advising students. The successful applicant will be expected to teach the equivalent of three online courses per term. The appointee is not required to be located in the Boston area.', 'Qualifications', 'Requirements:', '· Doctoral or master’s degree in statistics, biostatistics, data science or related fields.', '· Three or more years of experience as a course instructor or co-instructor teaching graduate, intermediate-level statistics or biostatistics.', '· A clear commitment to teaching excellence and a passion for teaching, mentoring, and supporting underrepresented minority students.', 'Preferred:', '· Proficient in using Stata.', '· Experience in online teaching.', 'Application Instructions', 'All applications should be submitted via Interfolio, at http://apply.interfolio.com/100664', 'The following materials are required:', '· Cover letter;', '· Statement of teaching interests and philosophy;', '· Statement explaining how your teaching and mentoring experience would contribute both to the MPH program and to Tufts University’s efforts at supporting a culture of diversity, equity and inclusion;', '· Curriculum vitae;', '· Names of three individuals who can provide letters of recommendation. (Letters of reference will be requested at a second stage).', 'To ensure full consideration, applications must be submitted by March 6, 2022. Review of applications will start immediately and continue until the position is filled.', 'Tufts University, founded in 1852, prioritizes quality teaching, highly competitive basic and applied research and a commitment to active citizenship locally, regionally and globally. Tufts University also prides itself on creating a diverse, equitable, and inclusive community. Current and prospective employees of the university are expected to have and continuously develop skill in positively engaging with a diverse population of faculty, staff, and students.', 'In addition, The Department of Public Health and Community Medicine has recently completed a curricular overhaul of our core public health classes to demonstrate a keen and explicit focus on health equity, eliminating inequities, and acknowledging the role of racism in exacerbating health disparities in communities of color.', 'Tufts University is an Equal Opportunity/ Affirmative Action Employer. We are committed to increasing the diversity of our faculty and staff and fostering their success, promotion, and retention when hired. Members of underrepresented groups (Black/African American, Latinx and indigenous people of color) are welcome and strongly encouraged to apply. If you are an applicant with a disability who is unable to use our online tools to search and apply for jobs, please contact us by calling Johny Laine in the Office of Equal Opportunity (OEO) at 617.627.3298. Applicants can learn more about requesting reasonable accommodations at http://oeo.tufts.edu.', 'For technical support please visit https://support.interfolio.com/ or phone 877-997-8807.', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Pay: $90,000.00 - $110,000.00 per year', 'Benefits:', 'Schedule:', 'COVID-19 considerations:\nThis is a completely remote position', 'Experience:', 'Work Location: Remote']
