descriptions_txt: ['Consultant/Analyst/Healthcare Planner II & III', 'The Innova Group is searching for a qualified Consultant/ Analyst/Healthcare Planner II & III to join our multidisciplinary planning team and support all aspects of project research, analysis, and deliverable development. The selected candidate for this position will analyze, assist, and develop innovative planning solutions for strategic, operational and/or facility planning issues for a multitude of service lines with healthcare system clients. The most successful candidates will demonstrate skills and experience in a blend of data science, analytics, data management, and healthcare planning.', 'The Innova Group is a Healthcare Planning Consultancy with offices and staff in Austin, Atlanta, Boston, Dallas, Denver, Minneapolis, Portland, St. Louis, Tucson, and Washington DC. Since 1995, we have been developing innovative solutions in healthcare strategy, operations, and facility planning, both nationally and overseas. We offer a small, entrepreneurial team culture with direct leadership mentoring, training, and involvement.', 'We work primarily on the “pre-design” portion of a capital investment project to build healthcare facilities —working with clients to ensure the project meets strategic, financial, and operational goals— setting the table for architectural design and real estate acquisition process. The Innova Group is a source of strategic healthcare planning and consulting services for large private systems such as Kaiser Permanente and Dignity Health, academic medical centers such as the University of New Mexico, community hospitals, and public sector systems such as the Military Health Service, Indian Health Service, and Veterans Affairs. More information on our firm is available at www.theinnovagroup.com.', 'Salary Range: Level II: $65,000-100,000, Level III: $100,000-150,000, dependent upon experience and qualifications', 'Job Description', 'Qualifications Required', 'Statistics, Economics, Applied Mathematics, Architecture, GIS, or other data/analysis intensive major', 'Technical Skills Considered', 'Location/Benefits/Travel', 'These positions are being offered nation-wide with preferences for communities with an existing Innova presence and Tucson. Depending on experience, the Healthcare Planner II positions may require an in- office position in Austin, Dallas, Denver, Minneapolis, St. Louis, or Tucson. We offer paid vacation, healthcare, healthcare savings account, 401K, and profit-sharing benefits. Compensation will be commensurate with qualifications and experience. Six to ten days travel per month may be required of this position.', 'Application Requirements', 'Interested individuals should submit an electronic (word or pdf) copy of their resume with a cover letter. A cover letter is essential and should clearly identify your career goal, your rationale for applying, a summary of your education and past work experience, and why you are a good fit for the position. Submissions without a cover letter will not be accepted.', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or national origin.', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Pay: $65,000.00 - $150,000.00 per year', 'Benefits:', 'Schedule:', 'Ability to commute/relocate:', 'Application Question(s):', 'Education:', 'Experience:', 'Willingness to travel:', 'Work Location: Multiple Locations']
descriptions_list: ['Acquire, normalize, and analyze multi-sector medical data (patient/facility/physician) utilized in modeling healthcare delivery and developing operational alternatives for healthcare systems', 'Forecast future healthcare utilization through trend analysis and extrapolation', 'Present and display data, analysis, and findings to help clients make decisions', 'Demonstrate expertise utilizing healthcare strategy, planning metrics, and emerging trends to define operational processes and resource requirements (capital, space, and staff) in healthcare planning documents for clinical staff, administrators, and architects', 'Assist and conduct strategy, operations, and facility evaluations', 'Assist and conduct Facility Master Plans and Regional Health Care System planning', 'Lead, facilitate, guide, and oversee analysis and planning on multiple project types and client sectors', 'Bachelor’s and/or master’s degree in one of the following programs: Healthcare, Business,', 'Level II: 4 -10 years of experience in healthcare strategy, operations, and/or facility planning', 'Level III: 10-15 years of experience in healthcare strategy, operations, and/or facility planning', 'Broad knowledge of healthcare services, delivery models, data sets, related codes, and facility, finance, and/or operation related planning metrics', 'Ability to create and communicate relevant solutions to complex problems through thoughtful and analysis', 'Public Speaking', 'Demonstrated team player with mentoring and/or leadership skills', 'MS Office: Outlook, Word, PowerPoint, and Excel (intermediate proficiency required - Pivot tables, complex “if” statements, conditional formatting)', 'SQL: intermediate proficiency (import data, indices, query/table development, CTE creation, etc.).', 'Database and/or application development skills', 'GIS Experience', 'Graphics capability (Graphic Design/Media/Other Dimensions)', 'Business Intelligence Tools o Tableau o Power Bi', 'Experience related to Innova core sectors (healthcare strategy/operations/facility planning)', 'Familiarity with CAD standards/procedures, as well as Revit, are desirable but not required.', 'When attaching your resume, please use following filename style: " last name_first name_resume.doc/pdf" (for example, if your name was Chris Miller and you were submitting a pdf file, your resume would be saved as "miller_chris_resume.pdf". Your cover letter may be copy/pasted directly into the box provided in the Indeed.com submission process.', 'The Innova Group does not compensate candidates for travel expenses associated with interviewing, unless otherwise indicated at the time of call for interview.', '401(k)', 'Dental insurance', 'Health insurance', 'Paid time off', 'Vision insurance', 'Monday to Friday', 'Tucson, AZ: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)', 'Are you comfortable with public speaking?', 'Do you presently hold a leadership or mentoring position within your current organization?', 'How many years of healthcare operations experience do you have?', 'How many years of healthcare strategy experience do you have?', 'How many years of facility planning experience do you have?', 'Are you willing to relocate to Tucson, Austin, or Dallas, where The Innova Group has a presence?', "Bachelor's (Required)", 'Healthcare management: 4 years (Required)', '50% (Preferred)']

descriptions_txt: ['DraftKings Inc. (Nasdaq: DKNG) is a digital sports entertainment and gaming company. It’s simple, at DraftKings, we believe life’s more fun with skin in the game. For that reason, we’re committed to responsibly creating the world’s favorite games and betting experiences. Headquartered in Boston, MA, with offices around the globe, we believe we can continue to define what it means to be a technology company in sports entertainment. We love what we do, and think you will too.', 'Our team comprises algorithm experts and data science technologists, coming together to develop innovative data products that solve analytically challenging problems at DraftKings. As part of this role, you will be a creative thinker, utilizing data, machine learning, and software development skills to craft high-impact solutions that grow the business.', 'Work within complex systems to lead the development of advanced algorithms, leveraging machine learning and quantitative techniques to produce models and systems that solve important business problems', 'Take ownership of engineering design, development, deployment, and operations of data science technical infrastructure', 'Collaborate with business stakeholders across the company to plan and execute valuable data science projects.', 'Guide design sessions and ensure your team delivers high-quality work that aligns with DraftKings engineering strategy.', 'Ideally, you have experience as a core contributor on a data science team where you were responsible for all aspects of data science technical projects, including development and deployment, and then monitoring of how those applications perform in production.', 'Expertise in a programming language like Python, Java, C#, or C++.', 'Deep understanding of quantitative methods, notably writing code to navigate machine learning and data analysis.', 'Ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to non-experts.', 'You will also need an intuitive sense of how quantitative work aligns with business priorities.', 'This position can sit in either Boston or remote; however, this work is to be performed entirely outside of Colorado.', 'We love working with talented people but more than that, we seek out compassionate co-workers with a collaborative spirit. Our work moves quickly and we’re great at coming together to find creative solutions to some of tech’s most interesting problems. If that sounds good to you, join us.', 'We’re proud to believe that your gender, race, nationality, religion, sexual orientation, status as a protected veteran, or status as an individual with a disability should have nothing to do with our hiring practices. We’ll never discriminate against anyone’s background or creed. If you’re good at what you do, we want you to do it at DraftKings.', 'We love working with talented people but more than that, we seek out compassionate co-workers with a collaborative spirit. Our work moves quickly and we’re great at coming together to find creative solutions to some of tech’s most interesting problems. If that sounds good to you, join us.', 'We’re inspired by our shared passion for developing creative solutions to complex challenges and empowering the people around us to do their best work. We are industry leaders in the digital entertainment and technology space propelled by constant curiosity and diverse perspectives.\n\nOur teams are fueled by innovation. We are looking ahead, building what’s next, and continuously reinventing the industry. We’re a publicly traded (NASDAQ: DKNG) technology company headquartered in Boston, with teams around the world and an expanding global presence.', 'We strive to create a place where all feel safe, empowered, engaged, championed, and inspired. DraftKings is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. This means we do not tolerate discrimination of any kind and are committed to providing equal employment opportunities regardless of your gender identity, race, nationality, religion, sexual orientation, status as a protected veteran, or status as an individual with a disability.', 'As a regulated gaming company, you may be required to obtain a gaming license issued by the appropriate state agency as a condition of employment.']

descriptions_txt: ['LifeQ is seeking a dynamic and experienced candidate for the role of Data Science Developer. The Data Science Developer is first and foremost a software engineer, but also possesses experience with Data Science methodologies and workflow patterns such as the extraction, loading and transformation of data (ETL). Machine learning engineers will be well positioned to apply.', 'LifeQ provides a fast-paced and dynamic work environment with access to industry-leading technology and collaboration with influential international corporations. The LifeQ team is fully remote-capable during the COVID-19 pandemic and will resume working in the Alpharetta, GA office when it is safe to do so.', 'LifeQ makes use of physiological, behavioral, and environmental data derived primarily from smart watches to produce models that quantify health status and the impact of behavioural choices. LifeQ’s solutions span several links in the IOT chain, ranging from on-device libraries that operate and process sensor data up to end-user apps and patient dashboards. LifeQ is the world’s leading independent provider of wearable biometrics and our clients include several device brands. Over 20 commercial wearable device models have been enabled to date, including Fortune top 10 brands.', 'The ideal candidate will be someone with an enthusiasm for managing and designing software solutions, an interest in enabling and upskilling coworkers, a willingness to learn and adapt to new challenges, and a drive to maximally enable innovation of Data Science centered products.', 'Job Description', 'The Data Science Developer will work closely with several Data Science teams running projects that incorporate a wide range of models and biologically inspired computational methods, using existing data and data forthcoming from pilot initiatives. The Data Science Developer’s function is to firstly extend the capabilities of Data Science Teams by enabling them to perform rapid first iteration end-to-end prototyping of new deliverables during early product development cycles and secondly to structure and architect a common toolset for the team.', 'In both capacities, the Data Science Developer will aid new and existing Data Science team members to understand and use common toolsets and frameworks for achieving these objectives. The Data Science Developer will also interface with LifeQ’s Research Engineering team and Chief Technology Officer that manage LifeQ’s commercially deployed models to align on internal software used in the production environment.', 'Note that the Data Science Developers role is distinct from that of a Data Scientist. Data Science Developers combine software engineering skills with Data Science capabilities.', 'The Data Science Developer will report to the company’s Chief Science Officer.', 'Responsibilities', 'Skills', 'Data Science Developers are first and foremost software engineers, but also possess some experience wrt Data Science concepts and workflow patterns such as the extraction, loading and transformation of data (ETL). Candidates meeting these requirements are invited to apply.', 'Work experience and qualifications', 'Ranked by relevance', 'Specific proficiencies', 'Ranked by relevance']
descriptions_list: ['Create new components and leverage existing software infrastructure for deploying existing data science models as end-to-end prototypes for first rounds of internal testing', 'Support benchmarking, A/B testing and status monitoring of the above end-to-end prototypes', 'Enable and upskill Data Science teams to make use of the above infrastructure for new models in development', 'Meet with Data Science teams to regularly review and to lead restructuring of their shared codebase for training models on big data', 'Creating documentation for all software created by the Data Science Developer to be used by the Data Science teams', 'Staying abreast of developments in the Data Science industry to ensure the team’s software tools are up to date.', 'Enable and upskill the Data Science teams wrt coding practice, documentation and software tools', 'Keeping a central inventory of all project code created by Data Science teams', 'Consulting with the Chief Technology Officer and Research Engineering team to maintain an up to date understanding of the commercial production environment that Data Science end-to-end prototypes will be translated to.', 'Consulting with the Chief Science Officer to determine and refine objectives', 'Experience as Data Science Developer or Machine Learning Engineer', '3 years of software development experience relevant to the role', "Bachelor's degree in computer science, electronic engineering or related STEM field", 'Master’s degree in data analytics, data science or similar will be advantageous.', 'Experience in prototype deployment: AWS serverless environment and Lambdas, Kafka or other applicable frameworks', 'Experience in Machine Learning frameworks, libraries, data structures, data modeling, and software architecture', 'Great communication and collaboration skills', 'Excellent time management and organizational abilities.', 'Superb analytical and problem-solving abilities', 'Advanced proficiency in Python', 'Experience with Docker, REST APIs', 'Code repository management', 'Experience in C, Go, Scala, Javascript, C++, Java', 'In-depth knowledge of mathematics, statistics, and algorithms']

descriptions_txt:
['Director, Data Science

About You', 'You excel using data science and machine learning to analyze large and complex data sets to develop and drive business strategy. You effectively communicate complex data analytics to executives, partners across the business, and teammates in a clear, concise manner that facilitates decision-making. You recruit, develop, and lead your team. Your guide and challenge them to think deeply, bring new ideas and solve problems creatively. You lead by example, communicate transparently, collaborate cross-functionally, and act decisively.', 'About Us
We are a highly diverse, collaborative, and entrepreneurial team of innovators, on a mission to transform the way ISPs serve consumers today. 2022 will be a pivotal year for our company, as we transform our service approach, lead the way in fiber technology innovations, and launch an enviable brand and customer experience.', 'About the Role
You are responsible for developing data science and machine learning models to segment and predict behaviors within our customer base. You must effectively communicate the outputs of these models and analytics across the business and to executives. You will lead, teach, and develop data scientists that will feed analytical and technical talent across the organization. This role is critical to meeting subscriber, operational cost, and revenue goals.', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications']
descriptions_list: ['Develop predictive models for churn, network experience, and customer behaviors like contacts, speed upgrades, and migrations using advanced statistical and machine learning processes.', 'Lead exploratory data analyses on new data sources and new uses of existing data to achieve customer experience and retention goals.', 'Maintain a center of excellence for A/B testing strategies for customer-impacting communications and tactics.', 'Responsible for quality control and accuracy of all team members’ outputs.', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience required", '7+ years experience in data science and machine learning', 'Expert skills in computer languages, coding, and the ability to learn new programs and techniques', 'Broad knowledge of and experience developing and deploying machine learning models', '3+ years experience leading and developing analytical talent', 'Excellent verbal, written, and presentation skills']
pros: ['"Generally good people and accommodating" (in 4 reviews)', '"Pay is above average" (in 3 reviews)', '"Encourages continuing education" (in 2 reviews)']
cons: ['"Slow in career growth since it\'s a big team" (in 5 reviews)', '"Lack of annual raise and communication if when it has been removed" (in 4 reviews)']

descriptions_txt:
["Interactive Consulting Services, Inc.'s (ICS) mission is to match elite talent with cutting-edge technologies and projects.", 'Interactive Consulting Services (ICS) is headquartered in Jarrettsville, MD, and has been providing IT and talent services for over 20 years. ICS has a proven track record in both the public and private sectors, providing talent and solutions in fields ranging from healthcare, education, and finance, to social services, defense, and aviation.', 'Responsibilities:', '· Planning data projects', '· Experiment with new models and techniques', '· Building analytic systems and predictive models', '· Managing a team of data scientists, machine learning engineers and big data specialists', '· Lead data mining and collection procedures', '· Ensure data quality and integrity', '· Interpret and analyze data problems', '· Conceive, plan and prioritize data projects', '· Align data projects with organizational goals', 'Description:', 'We are searching for a Lead Data Scientist to lead a team of data analysts to help us analyze and interpret large quantities of medical records using the latest cutting-edge technologies. This is a long-term project for a major federal agency. To be successful in this position, you should have strong problem-solving skills and an expert understanding of statistical analysis. You should also enjoy researching and implementing the latest data science algorithms and tools. If you understand how to apply data analytics to solve new business problems, and enjoy mentoring team members, we’d love to meet you!', 'Requirements:', '· Proven experience as a Data Scientist or similar role', '· Solid understanding of machine learning tools and algorithms', '· Knowledge of data management and visualization techniques', '· A knack for statistical analysis and predictive modeling', '· Strong knowledge of Python, R, and SageMaker', '· Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (MongoDB is a plus)', '· Strong organizational and leadership skills', '· Excellent communication skills', '· A business-first mindset', '· MS in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics or similar field', 'Work Authorization:

descriptions_txt: ['As senior member of the Digital Data team, the head of data architecture will play a hands-on leadership role to lead, develop and enhance the data architecture team. He or She will be responsible for the overall data architecture coherence and state of the art data platforms. Digital Data architecture team is in charge of setting the enterprise standards, reviewing and/or implementing solutions and services transversally in collaboration with the different data verticals (Data engineering, Data Dev Ops, visual engineering, Data Domain functions). This leader will ensure internal and external solutions are consistent to the overall strategies across Sanofi, relevant roadmaps, and internal standards where appropriate.', 'The position will report directly to the Global Head of Data architecture Operations and Governance. This role will closely work with multiple transversal Digital teams (e.g. Data, Agile CoE, Consumer Experience, Architecture committees), Digital Technology (e.g. infrastructure, cloud, network, cybersecurity), and key business stakeholders. Efforts will also include developing and reviewing business cases and identifying potential technologies that could support business capabilities and their digital transformations. This resource will have direct people management responsibilities and accountability for several teams:', 'Data Architects – technical solution architects supporting the Digital Data priorities within business & analytic, Real-World evidence, R&D, industrial affairs ...', 'Portfolio and Project Planning – Work closely with the program team and be in charge of defining priorities, resources and budgets.', 'This resource will also drive continuous improvements within their scope inclusive of documentation, processes, governance, success measurement criteria, and operating models.', 'KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS:', 'Have solid experience in developing Data architecture roadmaps, blueprints, and designing real world solutions. Experience with both Waterfall and Agile methodologies.', 'Possess practical knowledge of data solutions in business processes and business decisions. Pharmaceutical and life science experience is a nice to have.', 'Demonstrate excellent skills of translating requirements into workable, fit for purpose, technical designs and solutions. Have extensive experience on technical solution identification and rationalization.', 'Previous Hands-on experience in delivering and leading Data Science and machine learning projects', 'Proven experience in all phases of a Big Data/Analytics project: Concept & design, development, implementation, change and operation', 'Advanced experience in programming (Python, SQL, bash)', 'Experience with Docker, Kubernetes/AKS/EKS/Openshift', 'Experience with DevOps, CI/CD and MLOps automation', 'Experience in cloud architecting and machine learning technologies – Azure/AWS/GCP', 'Experience in data technologies Snowflake and other data warehouses, informatica, Kafka, AWS data toolbox, Airflow, databricks, .', 'Experience in designing data and/or machine learning solution architectures', 'Strong customer focus, assertiveness, and precise method of operation', 'Ability in understanding of architectural dependencies of technologies in a vast and complex environment', 'Able to communicate and present internally and externally in a confident manner', 'Proven ability to build develop and lead teams', 'Must be able to quickly adapt to a changing and highly dynamic work environment', 'Strong relationship management skills in working with business colleagues, Digital team members, senior leadership team members, and vendors', 'Demonstrated ability to lead and/or influence decision making', 'Resolve conflicts with tact and diplomacy', 'Ability to communicate clearly and effectively. Fluent in English, both orally and in writing. Other language skills are a plus', 'Ability to work autonomously and work effectively with global teams to get the job done', 'BACKGROUND:', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related scientific or technical disciplines. Advanced degree is preferred. Additional professional certificate is a plus", '>10+ years Data, ML Ops experience is a plus.', 'Strong demonstrated experience in leadership, Implementation and Operational Support, senior stakeholder management, business partnering, and clear, effective communication skills.', 'Experience leading multidisciplinary teams with direct supervisory and people management responsibilities.', 'Sanofi Inc. and its U.S. affiliates are Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employers committed to a culturally diverse workforce. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race; color; creed; religion; national origin; age; ancestry; nationality; marital, domestic partnership or civil union status; sex, gender, gender identity or expression; affectional or sexual orientation; disability; veteran or military status or liability for military status; domestic violence victim status; atypical cellular or blood trait; genetic information (including the refusal to submit to genetic testing) or any other characteristic protected by law.', '#GD-SA', '#LI-SA', 'At Sanofi diversity and inclusion is foundational to how we operate and embedded in our Core Values. We recognize to truly tap into the richness diversity brings we must lead with inclusion and have a workplace where those differences can thrive and be leveraged to empower the lives of our colleagues, patients and customers. We respect and celebrate the diversity of our people, their backgrounds and experiences and provide equal opportunity for all.']

job_title: Head, ShinrAI Center for Artificial Intelligence/ Machine Learning
descriptions_txt: ['By clicking the “Apply” button, I understand that my employment application process with Takeda will commence and that the information I provide in my application will be processed in line with Takeda’s Privacy Notice and Terms of Use. I further attest that all information I submit in my employment application is true to the best of my knowledge.', 'At Takeda, we are a forward-looking, world-class R&D organization that unlocks innovation and delivers transformative therapies to patients. By focusing R&D efforts on four therapeutic areas and other targeted investments, we push the boundaries of what is possible in order to bring life-changing therapies to patients worldwide.', "Join Takeda as a Head, ShinrAI Center for Artificial Intelligence/ Machine Learning. Takeda's ShinrAI Center for AI/ML is the newly created Center of Excellence for AI/ML. Shinrai is the Japanese word for trust. The ShinrAI Center for AI/ML represents the hub of data scientists, statisticians, and data engineers that will build algorithms that can be trusted by peers, colleagues, and patients. As part of the Data Architecture and Digital Solutions team, you will report to the Head of Data Architecture and Digital Solutions.", 'At Takeda, we are transforming patient care through the development of novel specialty pharmaceuticals and best in class patient support programs. Takeda is a patient-focused company that will inspire and empower you to grow through life-changing work.', 'Certified as a Global Top Employer, Takeda offers stimulating careers, encourages innovation, and strives for excellence in everything we do. We foster an inclusive, collaborative workplace, in which our teams are united by an unwavering commitment to deliver Better Health and a Brighter Future to people around the world.', 'Takeda is proud in its commitment to creating a diverse workforce and providing equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, parental status, national origin, age, disability, citizenship status, genetic information or characteristics, marital status, status as a Vietnam era veteran, special disabled veteran, or other protected veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws, and any other characteristic protected by law.', 'Absent an approved religious or medical reason, all US office-based and lab-based Takeda employees who work fully on-site or in a hybrid model (as determined by Takeda) must be fully vaccinated to work at a Takeda site or to engage with Takeda colleagues or anyone else on behalf of Takeda. US field-based employees must be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment, absent an approved religious or medical reason. US employees who work at a Takeda manufacturing facility, and those who work at a BioLife center or BioLife lab, may be subject to different guidelines. If you are contacted by a Takeda recruiter about your job application, we encourage you to seek more information on the applicable guidelines for the Business Unit/Function to which you have applied.', 'In accordance with the CO Equal Pay Act, Colorado Applicants Are Not Permitted to Apply.', '#LI-SGM', 'EEO Statement', 'Takeda is proud in its commitment to creating a diverse workforce and providing equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, parental status, national origin, age, disability, citizenship status, genetic information or characteristics, marital status, status as a Vietnam era veteran, special disabled veteran, or other protected veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws, and any other characteristic protected by law.']

descriptions_txt:
["Applecart is a high growth marketing technology company based in New York City, founded in 2013. Applecart has developed a proprietary social graph platform that uses publicly available data to map over 25 billion social relationships between more than 250 million adult Americans. Applecart's platform helps major corporations, national nonprofit organizations, and high-profile political campaigns with their highest stakes marketing challenge: reaching hard-to-reach audiences of decision makers, spanning corporate executives, legislators, regulators, investors, members of the media, and more.
For years, marketing technology businesses have focused on solving b2c (consumer) marketing challenges (e.g. look-a-like modeling to find new customers), but the traditional pay-per-impression advertising model has left a massive opportunity unsolved for: how to market when a company's target isn't the average consumer, but is instead a single, senior decision maker. Applecart is the solution to this problem for some of the world's most prominent organizations.
Quick facts about us:", "About the Role
We are looking for creative, self-motivated, flexible thinkers to join our team as a Data Analyst. Working with Applecart's political strategists, data analysts, and data scientists, the Data Analyst will contribute to targeting, analytics, and polling efforts on behalf of some of the country's most prominent trade associations, political campaigns, non-profits, independent expenditure efforts, and corporations.", "What You'll Do", 'Who You Are
Qualifications:', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Job Type: Full-time']
descriptions_list: ['Applecart has generated over $40M in revenue and is growing 100%+ Y-o-Y', "Our senior leadership team includes two members of the 2021 Forbes 30 under 30 list for Marketing and Advertising, a former senior White House advisor, one of the earliest sales leaders at Google and Twitter, and two of the Democratic Party's most successful pollsters and strategists", 'Our investors include global sports, entertainment and marketing giant Endeavor, KKR Co-Chairman and Co-CEO Henry Kravis, entrepreneur Chris Burch, a founder of Palantir, senior engineering leaders at Twitter and Yelp, past CEOs of Fortune 50 companies and a number of well-known venture capitalists. Endeavor CEO Ari Emanuel is a board member of the company.', 'Our work has been featured on Morning Joe on MSNBC, Bloomberg and The Colbert Report, and in Axios, BusinessWeek, the Associated Press, Forbes, the Washington Post, and Politico, among many others.', 'Work quickly and fluently in SQL to assess, ingest, and transform raw datasets into digestible analytics reports', "Partner with other data analysts to build predictive models using Applecart's social graph, demographic, and political behavior datasets", 'Translate findings from data analysis into digestible reports for non-technical, client audiences', 'Build advertising audiences for targeting and marketing that will drive maximum ROI with limited client resources', 'Draft survey questionnaires, create targets for weighting, create top-lines, and QC the result.', 'College level coursework in statistics, survey research, data analysis, sampling or mathematics', 'Ability to manage multiple tight timelines with competing deadlines', 'Outstanding attention to detail, you find the things others miss', 'Interest in or passion for politics, the legislative process, technology, data analytics, and data science', 'Ability to produce intuitive, client-ready data reports and visualizations', 'Proficiency in SQL', 'Experience working in advocacy, public affairs, political campaigns, public policy, product marketing, market research, or marketing analytics', 'History of being a self-starter and proactive team member', 'Experience with Python', 'Experience with survey research and experimental design techniques (A/B testing, RCT, etc. )']
pros: ['"Amazing colleagues and challenging work" (in 3 reviews)']
cons: ['"Less pay, long hours sometimes and they want us to come to the office" (in 1 reviews)', '"life boundaries and "senior" leadership is comprise of late twenties privileged boys who only care about making money for themselves." (in 1 reviews)']

descriptions_txt:
["Interactive Consulting Services, Inc.'s (ICS) mission is to match elite talent with cutting-edge technologies and projects.", 'Interactive Consulting Services (ICS) is headquartered in Jarrettsville, MD, and has been providing IT and talent services for over 20 years. ICS has a proven track record in both the public and private sectors, providing talent and solutions in fields ranging from healthcare, education, and finance, to social services, defense, and aviation.', 'Responsibilities:', '· Identify and analyze user requirements', '· Prioritize, assign and execute tasks throughout the software development life cycle', '· Develop Java Spring applications', '· Write well-designed, efficient code', '· Review, test and debug team members’ code', '· Design database architecture', '· Create NLP algorithms to evaluate medical records', '· Create custom tools to enable analysts to perform data research', '· Create software to import large quantities of medical documents', 'Description:', 'We are searching for a Senior Java / NLP Engineer to join a team of engineers to help us analyze and interpret large quantities of medical records using the latest cutting-edge technologies. This is a long-term project for a major federal agency. This individual will work with the Technical Architect and Business Analysts to design and implement software that will identify and interpret key information in medical documents. It will include data collection, algorithm development, and creating cutting-edge viewing technology to enable analysts to annotate documents for further development.', 'To be successful in this position, you have should strong problem-solving skills and a strong understanding of Java and Spring technologies. You should also enjoy solving new and unique problems and learning new technologies. descriptions_txt: ['UNITERS is a global manufacturing company that markets and distributes home care and repair products in 6 continents and more than 100 countries around the world. We are open to candidates located in Eastern/Central time zones with a preference of local candidates in West Palm Beach, Florida area.', 'The Data & Machine Learning Scientist will support the Machine Learning and Data Analytics program by utilizing their analytical, statistical, and programming skills to collect, analyze, and interpret Uniters disparate data sets. The Data & Machine Learning Scientist will use this information to develop data-driven insights and find solutions to improve the business top and bottom line. They will partner with the IT and Business Management to improve our current platform Machine Learning and Data Analytics investment and maximize its effectiveness. The Data & Machine Learning Scientist will be responsible for the oversight of data management activities and deliverables and providing the highest possible quality and efficiency of focused data management. The Data & Machine Learning Scientist applies strong expertise in machine learning, data mining, and information retrieval and develops efficient and accurate analytical models that mimic business decisions.', 'Required Skills & Education', 'Demonstrated leadership in designing and building at-scale high performing predictive models and algorithms and experience applying these methods to real world problems.', 'Demonstrated history of driving and delivering analytics models and solutions.', 'Strong knowledge of scripting languages such as Python and open-source machine learning and analytics packages', 'Strong knowledge of SQL', 'Demonstrated ability to propose novel solutions to problems, performing experiments to show feasibility of their solutions and working to refine the solutions into a real-world context.', 'Strong analytical, written, and verbal communication skills.', 'Ability to explain complex ideas in simple terms.', 'Keen on collaboration and teamwork in a multi-disciplinary environment', 'Required Education and Experience', 'BS/MS in Data Science or related field.', 'Minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience with real-world data and Data Science and/or Machine Learning role is required.', 'What You’ll Love About Working Here:', 'Friendly Team Environment', 'Comprehensive benefits package including: Medical, Dental, Vision, Life & Disability Insurance, and 401K options', 'Generous PTO Policy includes: 2 weeks of PTO accrual in your first year', 'Tuition Reimbursement', 'Learn more about our us at www.uniters.com', 'EEO Statement', 'UNITERS North America is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.']

descriptions_txt: ['Looking for a career in which you can make an impact? Join the award-winning IQVIA eCOA team on its journey to disrupt the healthcare industry and improve patients’ clinical research experience.', 'Who we’re looking for:', 'You will be part of a small and growing team of developers located across the US, focused on building new and modern software that’s positioned to revolution the clinical trial space. In this remote role, you’ll be empowered and encouraged to think “outside the box” to develop innovative solutions to drive business and the industry forward. Not only do you love to code, you are a self-motivated individual who can apply strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills to daily challenges. You’re ultimately a JavaScript/TypeScript aficionado, but also enjoys wearing many different hats.', 'Position overview:', 'We’re seeing immense growth in the industry, and so our core focus is scaling our application with stable, distributed back-end services. Bring your talent and drive to our team of passionate, creative, and innovative thinkers, focused on developing a sophisticated product that uses modern JavaScript. We have the support and resources of a large company but operate with a start-up culture. You’ll thrive in a fast-paced and agile environment, during which you see real-time results.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'SKILLS:', 'IQVIA eCOA', "Patients will always be the ultimate customer in healthcare, but they need to be heard. Our goal is to help ensure that each patient is at the center of care and give them a voice to share their story. IQVIA’s eCOA (electronic clinical outcomes assessment) Division has developed an award-winning platform that intelligently automates capturing patient's experiences through real-time, direct-from-patient data collection. This enables the client real-time access to the patient’s experience, which in-turn, improves the treatment and eventual outcome.", 'At IQVIA, we believe in pushing the boundaries of human science and data science to make the biggest impact possible – to help our customers create a healthier world. The advanced analytics, technology solutions and contract research services we provide to the life sciences industry are made possible by our 70,000+ employees around the world who apply their insight, curiosity and intellectual courage every step of the way. Learn more at jobs.iqvia.com.', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, status as a protected veteran, or any other status protected by applicable law.', 'IQVIA, Inc. provides reasonable accommodations for applicants with disabilities. Applicants who require reasonable accommodation to submit an application for employment or otherwise participate in the application process should contact IQVIA’s Talent Acquisition team at workday_recruiting@iqvia.com to arrange for such an accommodation.']
descriptions_list: ['Work collaboratively and efficiently across functional teams in a fast-paced startup-like environment.', 'High standard of engineering quality through code reviews and unit tests.', 'Extend our platform to handle an expanding set of features.', 'Design, extend, and implement APIs.', 'Create engineering efficiencies through automation and development of tools.', 'Regularly make specific determinations about system performance and respond with sense of urgency to review and fix bug reports.', 'Define engineering processes for product launch and releases.', 'Proactively work with Quality Assurance and DevOps to solve system problems.', 'Review and refactor legacy code.', 'Provide technical guidance and coaching to peers.', 'Expert in JavaScript/TypeScript, Node, and Express.js', 'Experience in working with Postgres, DynamoDB (Apache Pulsar, Kafka, ScyllaDB a plus)', 'Experience with cloud-based infrastructure (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure)', 'Familiar with system monitoring services (DataDog, Sentry.io, CloudWatch)', 'Ability to work independently and remotely with minimal supervision', 'Strong attention to detail']

descriptions_txt: ['Consultant/Analyst/Healthcare Planner II & III', 'The Innova Group is searching for a qualified Consultant/ Analyst/Healthcare Planner II & III to join our multidisciplinary planning team and support all aspects of project research, analysis, and deliverable development. The selected candidate for this position will analyze, assist, and develop innovative planning solutions for strategic, operational and/or facility planning issues for a multitude of service lines with healthcare system clients. The most successful candidates will demonstrate skills and experience in a blend of data science, analytics, data management, and healthcare planning.', 'The Innova Group is a Healthcare Planning Consultancy with offices and staff in Austin, Atlanta, Boston, Dallas, Denver, Minneapolis, Portland, St. Louis, Tucson, and Washington DC. Since 1995, we have been developing innovative solutions in healthcare strategy, operations, and facility planning, both nationally and overseas. We offer a small, entrepreneurial team culture with direct leadership mentoring, training, and involvement.', 'We work primarily on the “pre-design” portion of a capital investment project to build healthcare facilities —working with clients to ensure the project meets strategic, financial, and operational goals— setting the table for architectural design and real estate acquisition process. The Innova Group is a source of strategic healthcare planning and consulting services for large private systems such as Kaiser Permanente and Dignity Health, academic medical centers such as the University of New Mexico, community hospitals, and public sector systems such as the Military Health Service, Indian Health Service, and Veterans Affairs. More information on our firm is available at www.theinnovagroup.com.', 'Salary Range: Level II: $65,000-100,000, Level III: $100,000-150,000, dependent upon experience and qualifications', 'Job Description', 'Qualifications Required', 'Statistics, Economics, Applied Mathematics, Architecture, GIS, or other data/analysis intensive major', 'Technical Skills Considered', 'Location/Benefits/Travel', 'These positions are being offered nation-wide with preferences for communities with an existing Innova presence and Tucson. Depending on experience, the Healthcare Planner II positions may require an in- office position in Austin, Dallas, Denver, Minneapolis, St. Louis, or Tucson. We offer paid vacation, healthcare, healthcare savings account, 401K, and profit-sharing benefits. Compensation will be commensurate with qualifications and experience. Six to ten days travel per month may be required of this position.', 'Application Requirements', 'Interested individuals should submit an electronic (word or pdf) copy of their resume with a cover letter. A cover letter is essential and should clearly identify your career goal, your rationale for applying, a summary of your education and past work experience, and why you are a good fit for the position. Submissions without a cover letter will not be accepted.', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or national origin.', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Pay: $65,000.00 - $150,000.00 per year', 'Benefits:', 'Schedule:', 'Ability to commute/relocate:', 'Application Question(s):', 'Education:', 'Experience:', 'Willingness to travel:', 'Work Location: Multiple Locations']
descriptions_list: ['Acquire, normalize, and analyze multi-sector medical data (patient/facility/physician) utilized in modeling healthcare delivery and developing operational alternatives for healthcare systems', 'Forecast future healthcare utilization through trend analysis and extrapolation', 'Present and display data, analysis, and findings to help clients make decisions', 'Demonstrate expertise utilizing healthcare strategy, planning metrics, and emerging trends to define operational processes and resource requirements (capital, space, and staff) in healthcare planning documents for clinical staff, administrators, and architects', 'Assist and conduct strategy, operations, and facility evaluations', 'Assist and conduct Facility Master Plans and Regional Health Care System planning', 'Lead, facilitate, guide, and oversee analysis and planning on multiple project types and client sectors', 'Bachelor’s and/or master’s degree in one of the following programs: Healthcare, Business,', 'Level II: 4 -10 years of experience in healthcare strategy, operations, and/or facility planning', 'Level III: 10-15 years of experience in healthcare strategy, operations, and/or facility planning', 'Broad knowledge of healthcare services, delivery models, data sets, related codes, and facility, finance, and/or operation related planning metrics', 'Ability to create and communicate relevant solutions to complex problems through thoughtful and analysis', 'Public Speaking', 'Demonstrated team player with mentoring and/or leadership skills', 'MS Office: Outlook, Word, PowerPoint, and Excel (intermediate proficiency required - Pivot tables, complex “if” statements, conditional formatting)', 'SQL: intermediate proficiency (import data, indices, query/table development, CTE creation, etc.).', 'Database and/or application development skills', 'GIS Experience', 'Graphics capability (Graphic Design/Media/Other Dimensions)', 'Business Intelligence Tools o Tableau o Power Bi', 'Experience related to Innova core sectors (healthcare strategy/operations/facility planning)', 'Familiarity with CAD standards/procedures, as well as Revit, are desirable but not required.', 'When attaching your resume, please use following filename style: " last name_first name_resume.doc/pdf" (for example, if your name was Chris Miller and you were submitting a pdf file, your resume would be saved as "miller_chris_resume.pdf". Your cover letter may be copy/pasted directly into the box provided in the Indeed.com submission process.', 'The Innova Group does not compensate candidates for travel expenses associated with interviewing, unless otherwise indicated at the time of call for interview.', '401(k)', 'Dental insurance', 'Health insurance', 'Paid time off', 'Vision insurance', 'Monday to Friday', 'Austin, TX: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)', 'Are you comfortable with public speaking?', 'Do you presently hold a leadership or mentoring position within your current organization?', 'How many years of healthcare operations experience do you have?', 'How many years of healthcare strategy experience do you have?', 'How many years of facility planning experience do you have?', 'Are you willing to relocate to Tucson, Austin, or Dallas, where The Innova Group has a presence?', "Bachelor's (Required)", 'Healthcare management: 4 years (Required)', '50% (Preferred)']

descriptions_txt: ['Become a Part of the NIKE, Inc. Team', 'NIKE, Inc. does more than outfit the world’s best athletes. It is a place to explore potential, obliterate boundaries and push out the edges of what can be. The company looks for people who can grow, think, dream and create. Its culture thrives by embracing diversity and rewarding imagination. The brand seeks achievers, leaders and visionaries. At NIKE, Inc. it’s about each person bringing skills and passion to a challenging and constantly evolving game.', 'We are looking for a Sr. Director, Consumer Insights and Analytics. This role will lead “the voice of the Jordan consumer” and provide meaningful data-based insights. We need this individual to bring a strategic perspective on the consumer and their relationship to basketball culture. We need a strong, influential leader with deep expertise in driving insights, analytics, and strategy!', 'This role will be a critical part of the leadership team of Global Jordan Consumer Science + Insights team and the lead for North America Jordan Brand Insights and Analytics.', 'Through partnership with the other marketplace units with strong functional expertise, this team powers the geography’s consumer strategy applying quantitative and qualitative methods at the pace of the consumer.', 'The Sr. Director will partner across other multi-disciplinary analytics teams at Nike and Jordan, building and owning relationships with diverse business partners. You will also partner with Gender Leaders within Jordan North America to prioritize opportunities and build a pipeline of insights and data that helps inform every aspect of our value chain.', 'NIKE, Inc. is a growth company that looks for team members to grow with it. Nike offers a generous total rewards package, casual work environment, a diverse and inclusive culture, and an electric atmosphere for professional development. No matter the location, or the role, every Nike employee shares one galvanizing mission: To bring inspiration and innovation to every athlete* in the world.', 'NIKE, Inc. is committed to employing a diverse workforce. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability.']

education and experience and training", '10+ years in Data Science, Advanced Analytics and/or Consumer Insights', 'Applied experience interpreting qualitative and quantitative data to drive business decisions that will enable membership and revenue growth across the integrated marketplace in North America.', '5 or more years of demonstrated ability influencing a multidisciplinary team and a descriptions_txt: ['Overview', 'Right now, CPGs and retailers are working in the dark when it comes to pricing information and strategy. Datasembly is changing that. These are massive industries with billions of dollars on the line every year. Datasembly’s data-driven approach is changing how these companies are thinking about pricing strategy, deploying billions of dollars, and communicating both internally and externally. And we are just getting started.', 'Why Datasembly?', 'What makes a Sembler?', 'What We Need From You', 'The Details', 'Datasembly is a fully-remote organization. We provide a convenient WFH work-life-balance, health, dental, and vision benefits, allowances for home office gear and co-working spaces, as well as unlimited PTO, and generous parental leave.', 'Datasembly is only hiring those authorized to work in the United States and unable to provide visa sponsorship at this time.', 'Salary Range: 110k-140k', 'The estimate displayed represents the typical salary range of candidates hired. descriptions_txt: ["Are you a high performing technologist passionate about cutting edge data engineering developments? Do you enjoy reading and investigating advancements in applied data engineering? Are you the go-to mentor and teacher in your organization and community for others who want to learn more about data engineering? As a member of Capital One’s data engineering community in our Tech College organization, you'll be part of an elite group that’s spreading knowledge and understanding about data engineering to experienced data engineering practitioners, newcomers to the art, and executives who need to make decisions regarding data engineering utilization and projects.", 'Learning is now a continuous, lifelong activity. Since tech skills now have a half-life of about two and half years, how could it be any other way? Recognizing this, Capital one established Tech College in 2017 to revolutionize the learning experience for associates. In particular, Tech College is technologist-driven. Yes, we do have experts in learning and educational design. But, it’s the subject matter experts in machine learning, data engineering, cloud, cyber, mobile, software engineering, and agile that set the direction and curate or create the learning content.', 'As a Data Engineer in the Data Discipline of Capital One’s Tech College, you’ll be part of a team responsible for curating, designing, developing, and delivering highly engaging learning experiences that will fuel our growth as a tech company and help our associates develop cutting-edge skills in data engineering. We’ll also expect you to keep up with the latest and greatest data engineering tools and capabilities so that you can lead Capital One’s data engineering community. You will work alongside highly technical peers, with deep domain expertise to deliver game changing learning experiences for our associates. You’ll also be expected to work with our university partners in getting creative about data learning. Tech College is a great spot from which to learn about Capital One’s broader data engineering community so you can spot your next great opportunity, for whenever you’re ready to move back into full-time project delivery.', 'Tech College is a bold investment in developing our associates and leaders, recruiting top technical talent, and continuing to differentiate ourselves in the market. Tech College aims to transform our approach to enabling our associates and leaders with the technical skills they need to be successful in current and future roles.', 'Who you are:', 'Experienced. You need to have earned a few bumps and bruises while developing and implementing data engineering solutions to business problems.', 'Innovative. You continually research and evaluate emerging technologies. You stay current on published state-of-the-art methods, technologies, and applications and seek out opportunities to apply them.', 'A leader. You challenge conventional thinking and work with stakeholders to identify and improve the status quo. You’re passionate about talent development.', 'Technical. You’re comfortable with open-source languages and are passionate about developing further. You have hands-on experience developing data science solutions using open-source tools and cloud computing platforms.', 'In this role, you will:', 'Partner with a cross-functional team of data scientists, software engineers, product managers, and learning specialists to develop and deliver a learning product that people love', 'Teach a broad stack of technologies — Python, Tensorflow, Scikit-Learn, AWS, H2O, Spark, and more — for revealing the insights hidden within huge volumes of numeric and textual data', 'Teach others how to build data engineering models through all phases of development, from design through training, evaluation, validation, and implementation', 'Flex your interpersonal skills to translate the complexity of your work into tangible business goals', 'Curate existing content from various sources like universities, commercial content providers, and publicly available material', 'Develop and conduct training through a variety of modes (in person, on-line, self-paced, blended)', 'Create hands-on challenges to highlight Capital One data, business problems, and practices', 'Basic Qualifications:', 'Bachelor’s Degree', 'At least 2 years of experience in data engineering', 'At least 2 year of experience working on streaming data applications (Spark Streaming, Kafka, Kinesis, or Flink)', 'At least 2 years of experience with Python or Scala', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Master’s Degree', '1+ years of experience with a public cloud (AWS, Microsoft Azure, or Google Cloud)', '3+ years of experience in Python, Scala, or R', '3+ years of experience in machine learning', '1+ year of experience in teaching or creating curriculum content', 'At this time, Capital One will not sponsor a new applicant for employment authorization for this position.', 'If you have visited our website in search of information on employment opportunities or to apply for a position, and you require an accommodation, please contact Capital One Recruiting at 1-800-304-9102 or via email at RecruitingAccommodation@capitalone.com. All information you provide will be kept confidential and will be used only to the extent required to provide needed reasonable accommodations.', "For technical support or questions about Capital One's recruiting process, please send an email to Careers@capitalone.com", 'Capital One does not provide, endorse nor guarantee and is not liable for third-party products, services, educational tools or other information available through this site.', 'Capital One Financial is made up of several different entities. Please note that any position posted in Canada is for Capital One Canada, any position posted in the United Kingdom is for Capital One Europe and any position posted in the Philippines is for Capital One Philippines Service Corp. (COPSSC).']

descriptions_txt: ['About Us:', 'Versova, a family of companies, is a leader in the production of eggs and egg products, with operations in Iowa, Ohio, Washington and Oregon. Our fully integrated operations raise chicks, young hens, and laying hens. To ensure our eggs are fresh, safe, and wholesome when they reach our customers, we produce and process more than 3 billion eggs, annually, right on our farms.', 'Our farms are committed to the passionate adherence to animal care standards for our flocks. We believe in responsibly operating our farms to help protect the environment, being good neighbors in our communities, and producing the safest, highest-quality eggs for our consumers.', 'We offer competitive wages, a compensation program with excellent benefits, including 401K, health, dental, Short-Term Disability and life insurance.', 'Job Summary:', 'The Nutrition Specialist is a cross-functional role with responsibilities in formulation and ingredient procurement. This includes maintaining all information in the least-cost formulation software and working with ingredient vendors to ensure that company feed mills have a reliable supply of ingredients.\nEssential Job Functions:\nThis list of duties and responsibilities is not all-inclusive and may be expanded to include other duties and responsibilities as management may deem necessary', 'Qualifications and Skills:', 'Education and Experience:', 'Travel: This is primarily an office job. The employee will be asked to periodically visit company feed mills and attend industry tradeshows, requiring overnight travel. Mills are in Ohio (2), Iowa (3), Washington (1), and Oregon (1).', 'Location: Preferred Ames, Iowa, or company office in Sioux Center, Iowa; Johnstown, Ohio; or Canby, Oregon. Remote work arrangements considered.', 'Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. (While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to sit; use hands to finger, handle, or feel; and talk or hear.', '"Versova" is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, gender, national origin, color, religion, age, genetics, sexual orientation, disability, or veteran status.', 'NOTE: This job description is not intended to be all-inclusive. The employee may perform other related duties as assigned to meet the ongoing needs of the organization. The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by people assigned to this classification. They are not to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, and skills required of personnel so classified. All personnel may be required to perform duties outside of their normal responsibilities from time to time, as needed.', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Pay: $45,000.00 - $71,000.00 per year', 'Benefits:', 'Schedule:', 'Work Location: One location']
descriptions_list: ['Manage formulation software for multiple feed mills including maintaining ingredient prices, nutrient levels, and diet specifications.', 'Run least-cost optimization and transmit formulas to feed mills accurately and timely.', 'Summarize and interpret laboratory results of ingredients and complete feed.', 'Work in multiple software systems as an integral part of feed ingredient tracking and accounting.', 'Continually seek improvements in processes, develop efficiencies, and expand the use of existing and new software.', 'Collaboration with feed milling team, ingredient purchasing, and accounting as an integral part of our egg production team.', 'Occasional requests outside normal working hours to support feed milling operations.', 'Other duties as needed.', 'Detail oriented and analytical. Ability to take large amounts of data and summarize into actionable information.', 'Proficient with MS Excel including writing and troubleshooting basic macros.', 'Ability to manage complex situations through critical thinking, problem solving and decision-making skills.', 'Ability to adapt effectively and work at a high level within a fast paced, continually changing, and demanding environment.', 'Ability to communicate effectively with all constituencies, including employees, customers, suppliers, and regulatory agencies.', 'Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and prioritize multiple requests.', 'Feed formulation or data science experience preferred', 'Relevant areas of study – Animal Science, Ag Business, Accounting, Mathematics, or related.', 'Experience in the feed ingredient, poultry, agriculture, or food processing industry a plus', '401(k)', 'Dental insurance', 'Flexible schedule', 'Health insurance', 'Life insurance', 'Paid time off', 'Vision insurance', '8 hour shift']

job_title: Senior Data Scientist, SNKRS and Fairness
descriptions_txt:
['Become a Part of the NIKE, Inc. Team', 'NIKE, Inc. does more than outfit the world’s best athletes. It is a place to explore potential, obliterate boundaries and push out the edges of what can be. The company looks for people who can grow, think, dream and create. Its culture thrives by embracing diversity and rewarding imagination. The brand seeks achievers, leaders and visionaries. At NIKE, Inc. it’s about each person bringing skills and passion to a challenging and constantly evolving game.', 'SNKRS & NBHD comprise Nike’s consumer-led streetwear ecosystem. This multi-disciplinary team creates inspired, brand-defining, and inclusive products, stories, experiences, and business models that harness the energy from our communities, shape culture, and create lasting emotional bonds with our consumers.', 'WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR

We’re looking for data scientists with industry experience and a passion for understanding consumer behavior. The role requires both the mathematical rigor to develop predictive and descriptive models as well as the creativity to identify new opportunities to bring value through data-driven insights and innovation. The candidate should have a history of collaborating with multi-disciplinary teams, delivering work on time against a roadmap, and sharing their work with non-technical audiences. A bias for action, an entrepreneurial spirit, and demonstrated ability to work in a rapidly changing environment are also essential.', 'WHAT YOU WILL WORK ON

In this role, you will apply contemporary data science and analytics methods to', 'WHO YOU WILL WORK WITH

As part of the SNKRS + NBHD Data Science and Analytics team, you will be working with other data scientists and analysts as well as a diverse range of multi-functional business partners. The team is in Nike’s Direct Analytics org and Insights function.', 'NIKE, Inc. is a growth company that looks for team members to grow with it. Nike offers a generous total rewards package, casual work environment, a diverse and inclusive culture, and an electric atmosphere for professional development. No matter the location, or the role, every Nike employee shares one galvanizing mission: To bring inspiration and innovation to every athlete* in the world.', 'NIKE, Inc. is committed to employing a diverse workforce. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability.']
descriptions_list: ['Extract consumer preferences and tendencies from event streams', 'Develop algorithms to target and reward our most deserving members', 'Predict which consumers and how many are likely to want to purchase upcoming footwear and apparel', 'Create models and simulations to understand marketplace dynamics', 'Design and analyze experiments to illuminate causality', 'Be a strategic partner to business team members and lead research and analysis to inform business strategy', 'Build stakeholder-facing tools to support decision-making', 'Create clear and structured work to clearly communicate significant insights to a non-technical audience', "Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Business, Psychology, Economics, or similarly quantitative.", 'Minimum 5 years of relevant professional experience in analytics or data science', 'Experience working with real-world, large data sets (>100GB)', 'Ability to work in multiple data environments and perform complex joins, data cleaning, and feature creation using SQL or SQL-based languages (e.g., Hive)', 'Significant experience coding in Python', 'Demonstrable experience building positive working relationships in multi-functional teams, including demonstrated success in managing through influence.', 'Demonstrated ability to use data to influence decision-making through compelling storytelling and presentations to executive-level partners.', 'Track record of owning high-impact work from idea to delivery', 'Ability to manage multiple tracks of work and requirements delivered on time and accurately.', 'Plus: advanced degree in quantitative field', 'Plus: experience with rigorous experimentation', 'Plus: experience creating data products and dashboards (e.g., in Tableau)', 'Plus: passion for Nike sneakers and streetwear culture.']

job_title: Senior Director, Digital Experience Data Science
descriptions_txt: ['Become a Part of the NIKE, Inc. Team', 'NIKE, Inc. does more than outfit the world’s best athletes. It is a place to explore potential, obliterate boundaries and push out the edges of what can be. The company looks for people who can grow, think, dream and create. Its culture thrives by embracing diversity and rewarding imagination. The brand seeks achievers, leaders and visionaries. At NIKE, Inc. it’s about each person bringing skills and passion to a challenging and constantly evolving game.', 'WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR', 'We are looking for a seasoned data science leader for our Digital Experiences Data Science team. The Senior Director of Digital Experiences role will be responsible for leading the data science teams that work on optimizing and personalizing Nike’s digital experiences. These experiences include both Nike.com and on the Nike app in the United States, China, Europe, and elsewhere around the globe, as well as Nike’s SNKRS and WeChat apps. Today, this body of work is focused on using machine learning for search relevance and product recommendations. The aim is to leverage data science more broadly across these digital platforms.', 'WHAT WILL YOU WORK ON', 'You will…', 'WHO WILL YOU WORK WITH', 'You will be the leader of the Digital Experiences Data Science team, reporting to the Vice President of Consumer Data Science. Digital Experiences Data Science is part of Nike’s Consumer Data Science sub-function and Insights and Analytics function. So you will be a member of the broader data science and analytics community at Nike, and help organize and participate in our data science labs, study groups, and team activities, and attend conferences.', 'WHAT YOU BRING', 'NIKE, Inc. is a growth company that looks for team members to grow with it. Nike offers a generous total rewards package, casual work environment, a diverse and inclusive culture, and an electric atmosphere for professional development. No matter the location, or the role, every Nike employee shares one galvanizing mission: To bring inspiration and innovation to every athlete* in the world.', 'NIKE, Inc. is committed to employing a diverse workforce. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability.']
descriptions_list: ['Partner closely with the other data science leaders within Consumer Data Science. This includes aligning Digital Experience Data Science roadmaps with our those of the data science teams working in the areas of sport activity, content planning, and marketing communications. Reuse data and models where possible.', 'Partner closely with Nike’s Digital Product Management leadership, providing input into the overall digital roadmaps, and in particular helping to identify and advocate for high leverage uses of data and data science across Nike’s digital experiences.', 'Partner closely with Nike’s Global Technology leadership that works on data engineering, platform engineering, and experience engineering. Ensure that the foundational data, systems, and processes are in place to successfully execute on data science.', 'Evaluate the evolving landscape of vendors of data science capabilities for ecommerce and develop a position on which capabilities should be built in house.', 'Lead through leaders, including our search and personalization data science leaders and teams that are in place today and who will report into this role.', 'Be an inspirational thought leader within the broader analytics and data science communities at Nike.', 'Hire, onboard, and mentor talented data scientists and data science leaders.', 'Experience developing strong partnerships with engineering and product teams.', 'Experience managing through senior managers.', 'Experience hiring and mentoring exceptional data scientists.', 'Experience communicating technical roadmaps to business leaders.', 'Experience practicing data science, even if not recently.', 'A product and entrepreneurial mindset.', 'Bachelors degree or higher or Combination of relevant education, experience and training.']

job_title: Visiting Researcher, Methods/Models for Human Perception (PhD)
descriptions_list: ['Advance the state-of-the-art in human-in-the-loop experimentation for perception and perceptually-informed outcomes.', 'Consult and collaborate with partner and client teams to deploy experimentation tooling in real experiments and experiences.', "Currently has, or is in the process of obtaining a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, relevant technical field, or equivalent practical experience. Degree must be completed prior to joining Meta.", 'Currently has, or is in the process of obtaining, a PhD degree in psychology, cognitive science, neuroscience, machine learning, statistics, data science, relevant technical field, or equivalent practical experience. Degree must be completed prior to joining Meta.', '2+ years research experience in an area with potential applications to human-in-the-loop experimentation in human perception and related domains. Example areas include computational cognitive science, computational neuroscience, models and methods for psychophysics, active learning, deep Bayesian learning, Gaussian Process models, hierarchical/multitask models, or other relevant areas, as demonstrated via publications (conference or journal), open-source contributions, or similar venues.', '1+ years of experience communicating and collaborating with other researchers, as demonstrated by collaborative projects or co-authored research presentations, material (publications/blog posts), or similar.', 'Must obtain work authorization in the country of employment at the time of hire and maintain ongoing work authorization during employment.', 'Experience with crossing disciplinary boundaries, for example from machine learning and statistics to cognitive science, from applied mathematics to neuroscience, or similar, as demonstrated by collaborations across disciplinary domains.', 'Experience creating research software used by others, for example as part of an academic collaboration, an open-source project, or equivalent.', 'Experience with SciPy/NumPy and at least one automatic differentiation framework (PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX, Stan, etc.) - PyTorch preferred.', 'Experience solving complex problems and comparing alternative solutions, tradeoffs, and diverse points of view to determine a path forward.', 'Experience working and communicating cross functionally in a team environment.']
